original: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @1b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: aa bhi dharma ko sh'a k'a ri k'a /
analyzed: aa bhi dharma ko sh'a k'a ri k'a /
translated: Abhidharmakośakārikā

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa /
analyzed: chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa /
translated: The Verses of the Treasury of Abhidharma

original: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to youthful Mañjuśrī!

original: gang zhig kun la mun pa gtan bcom zhing //
analyzed: gang zhig kun la mun pa gtan bcom zhing //
translated: He who has utterly destroyed darkness everywhere

original: 'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs mdzad pa //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i 'dam las 'gro ba drangs mdzad pa //
translated: and has pulled beings out of the mire of saṃsāra,

original: don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas //
analyzed: don bzhin ston pa de la phyag 'tshal nas //
translated: having paid homage to him, the teacher of truth,

original: chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos rab bshad bya //
analyzed: chos mngon mdzod kyi bstan bcos rab bshad bya //
translated: I will explain the treatise of the Treasury of Abhidharma.

original: chos mngon shes rab dri med rjes 'brang bcas //🔽de thob bya phyir gang dang bstan bcos gang //
analyzed: chos mngon shes rab dri med rjes 'brang bcas // de thob bya phyir gang dang bstan bcos gang //
translated: Abhidharma is stainless wisdom together with its following;🔽in order to attain that, there is this treatise.

original: 'dir de don du yang dag chud phyir ram //
analyzed: 'dir de don du yang dag chud phyir ram //
translated: Either because it is the true meaning,

original: 'di yi gnas de yin pas chos mngon mdzod //🔽chos rnams rab tu rnam 'byed med par nyon mongs rnams //
analyzed: 'di yi gnas de yin pas chos mngon mdzod // chos rnams rab tu rnam 'byed med par nyon mongs rnams //
translated: or because that is its domain, it is the Treasury of Abhidharma.🔽Without the thorough differentiation of phenomena,

original: gang phyir nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la //
analyzed: gang phyir nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i thabs med la //
translated: there is no means to pacify the afflictions,

original: nyon mongs pas kyang 'jig rten srid mtsho 'dir 'khyams te //
analyzed: nyon mongs pas kyang 'jig rten srid mtsho 'dir 'khyams te //
translated: and due to the afflictions, one wanders in this ocean of existence.

original: de bas de phyir 'di ni ston pas gsungs so lo //
analyzed: de bas de phyir 'di ni ston pas gsungs so lo //
translated: Therefore, the Teacher has said that this is the truth of suffering.

original: zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams //
analyzed: zag bcas zag pa med chos rnams //
translated: The dharmas are contaminated and uncontaminated.

original: lam ma gtogs pa'i 'dus byas rnams //🔽zag bcas gang phyir de dag la //
analyzed: lam ma gtogs pa'i 'dus byas rnams // zag bcas gang phyir de dag la //
translated: The conditioned dharmas, with the exception of the path,🔽are contaminated, because the contaminants

original: @2a * // zag rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur //
analyzed: @2a * // zag rnams kun tu rgyas par 'gyur //
translated: increase in them.🔽The uncontaminated dharmas are the truth of the path,

original: zag med lam gyi bden pa dang // 'dus ma byas rnam gsum yang ste //
analyzed: zag med lam gyi bden pa dang // 'dus ma byas rnam gsum yang ste //
translated: and the three types of unconditioned dharmas:

original: nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang ni 'gog pa gnyis //
translated: space and the two types of cessation.

original: de la nam mkha' mi sgrib pa'o //🔽so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gang //
analyzed: de la nam mkha' mi sgrib pa'o // so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gang //
translated: Space is nonobstruction.

original: bral ba'o so so so so yin //🔽skye la gtan du gegs byed pa //
analyzed: bral ba'o so so so so yin // skye la gtan du gegs byed pa //
translated: Cessation is the abandonment🔽of that which is to be abandoned by the path of vision.

original: 'gog gzhan so sor brtags min pas //🔽'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang //
analyzed: 'gog gzhan so sor brtags min pas // 'dus byas chos rnams de dag kyang //
translated: The other cessation is nonanalytical.🔽The conditioned dharmas are the five aggregates,

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po lnga //
translated: such as form.

original: de dag nyid dus gtam gzhi dang // nges par 'byung bcas gzhi dang bcas //
analyzed: de dag nyid dus gtam gzhi dang // nges par 'byung bcas gzhi dang bcas //
translated: They are also called the aggregates, the bases, and the elements.

original: gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i //
analyzed: gang dag zag bcas nyer len pa'i //
translated: Those that are contaminated are also called the appropriated aggregates.

original: phung po'ang de dag 'thab bcas kyang //
analyzed: phung po'ang de dag 'thab bcas kyang //
translated: They are also called the aggregates of conflict.

original: sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang // lta gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin //🔽gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang don //
analyzed: sdug bsngal kun 'byung 'jig rten dang // lta gnas srid pa'ang de dag yin // gzugs ni dbang po lnga dang don //
translated: and also the abodes of the views and existence.🔽Form is the five sense faculties and their five objects,

original: lnga dang rnam rig byed min nyid //
analyzed: lnga dang rnam rig byed min nyid //
translated: and also the imperceptible form.

original: de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten //
analyzed: de dag rnams kyi rnam shes rten //
translated: The supports of the consciousnesses of those

original: mig la sogs gzugs dang ba rnams //
analyzed: mig la sogs gzugs dang ba rnams //
translated: are the eyes, etc., which are clear forms.🔽Form is twofold: the two kinds of form

original: gzugs rnam gnyis dang rnam nyi shu //
analyzed: gzugs rnam gnyis dang rnam nyi shu //
translated: and the twenty varieties.

original: sgra ni rnam pa brgyad yod de //
analyzed: sgra ni rnam pa brgyad yod de //
translated: Sound is of eight kinds.

original: ro ni rnam drug dri rnam bzhi //
analyzed: ro ni rnam drug dri rnam bzhi //
translated: Taste is of six kinds, smell of four kinds,

original: reg bya bcu gcig bdag nyid do //🔽g-yengs dang sems med pa yi yang //
analyzed: reg bya bcu gcig bdag nyid do // g-yengs dang sems med pa yi yang //
translated: and the tangible is of eleven kinds.🔽That which is connected with virtue and nonvirtue

original: dge dang mi dge rjes 'brel gang //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge rjes 'brel gang //
translated: of those distracted and mindless🔽is called nonindicative form.

original: 'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa //🔽de ni rnam rig byed min brjod //
analyzed: 'byung ba che rnams rgyur byas pa // de ni rnam rig byed min brjod //
translated: It is derived from the great elements.🔽The elements are the earth element,

original: 'byung ba dag ni sa @2b khams dang // chu dang me dang rlung khams rnams //
analyzed: 'byung ba dag ni sa @2b khams dang // chu dang me dang rlung khams rnams //
translated: the water, fire, and wind elements.

original: 'dzin pa la sogs las su grub //
analyzed: 'dzin pa la sogs las su grub //
translated: They are established as the function of support, etc.

original: sra gsher dro nyid g-yo ba rnams //🔽'jig rten gyi ni tha snyad du //
analyzed: sra gsher dro nyid g-yo ba rnams // 'jig rten gyi ni tha snyad du //
translated: They are solidity, liquidity, heat, and motility.🔽Earth is said to be color and shape

original: kha dog dbyibs la sa zhes brjod //
analyzed: kha dog dbyibs la sa zhes brjod //
translated: in the conventions of the world.

original: chu me yang ngo rlung tshogs khams //
analyzed: chu me yang ngo rlung tshogs khams //
translated: Water and fire are also the elements of water and fire.

original: nyid yin de dang 'dra ba'ang yin //
analyzed: nyid yin de dang 'dra ba'ang yin //
translated: Wind is the wind element.🔽Space and consciousness are the space element and the consciousness element.

original: dbang don de dag kho na la //
analyzed: dbang don de dag kho na la //
translated: These very sense faculties and objects

original: skye mched dang ni khams bcur 'dod //
analyzed: skye mched dang ni khams bcur 'dod //
translated: are asserted to be the ten bases and constituents.

original: tshor ba myong ba'o 'du shes ni //
analyzed: tshor ba myong ba'o 'du shes ni //
translated: Feeling is the experience of the object.

original: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Discrimination is the apprehension of the signs of the object.

original: 'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan //
analyzed: 'du byed phung po bzhi las gzhan //
translated: Formations are that which is other than the four aggregates.

original: de gsum rnam rig byed min dang // 'dus ma byas rnams bcas pa ni //
analyzed: de gsum rnam rig byed min dang // 'dus ma byas rnams bcas pa ni //
translated: These three, the unobservable, and the unconditioned

original: chos kyi skye mched khams zhes bya //
analyzed: chos kyi skye mched khams zhes bya //
translated: are called the phenomena base and constituent.

original: rnam shes so sor rnam rig pa //
analyzed: rnam shes so sor rnam rig pa //
translated: Consciousness is the individual awareness of each object.

original: yid kyi skye mched kyang de yin //
analyzed: yid kyi skye mched kyang de yin //
translated: It is also the mental base.

original: khams bdun dag tu'ang 'dod pa ste //
analyzed: khams bdun dag tu'ang 'dod pa ste //
translated: It is asserted to be the seven constituents.

original: rnam par shes pa drug dang yid //🔽drug po 'das ma thag pa yi //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa drug dang yid // drug po 'das ma thag pa yi //
translated: The six consciousnesses and the mind.🔽The consciousness that has just ceased

original: rnam shes gang yin de yid do //
analyzed: rnam shes gang yin de yid do //
translated: is the mental faculty.

original: drug pa'i rten ni rab bsgrub phyir ;
analyzed: drug pa'i rten ni rab bsgrub phyir ;
translated: In order to establish the support of the sixth,

original: / khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod //
analyzed: / khams ni bco brgyad dag tu 'dod //
translated: the constituents are asserted to be eighteen.

original: phung po dang ni skye mched dang // khams gcig gis ni thams cad bsdus //
analyzed: phung po dang ni skye mched dang // khams gcig gis ni thams cad bsdus //
translated: All are included in one aggregate, one base, and one constituent.

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis te //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis te //
translated: They are the same in terms of their own nature.

original: gzhan gyi dngos dang mi ldan phyir //
analyzed: gzhan gyi dngos dang mi ldan phyir //
translated: They are not endowed with the nature of the other.

original: mig la sogs pa gnyis mod kyi //🔽rigs dang spyod yul rnam par shes ;
analyzed: mig la sogs pa gnyis mod kyi // rigs dang spyod yul rnam par shes ;
translated: Although there are two eyes,🔽because their type, object, and consciousness are similar,

original: /'dra ba'i phyir na khams gcig nyid //
analyzed: /'dra ba'i phyir na khams gcig nyid //
translated: they are considered to be one element.

original: mdzes bya'i phyir na gnyis byung ngo //🔽spungs dang skye sgo rigs kyi don //
analyzed: mdzes bya'i phyir na gnyis byung ngo // spungs dang skye sgo rigs kyi don //
translated: Two eyes are produced for the sake of beauty.🔽The meaning of the term “aggregate” is a heap.

original: phung po skye mched khams rnams yin //🔽rmongs dbang 'dod rnam gsum gyi phyir //
analyzed: phung po skye mched khams rnams yin // rmongs dbang 'dod rnam gsum gyi phyir //
translated: The meaning of the term “source” is a gate of origination.🔽The meaning of the term “element” is a family.🔽The aggregates, sources, and elements were taught for the purpose of the three: confusion, domination, and desire.

original: phung po la sogs gsum bstan to //
analyzed: phung po la sogs gsum bstan to //
translated: The three, the aggregates and so on, were taught for the purpose of the three: confusion, domination, and desire.

original: rtsod pa'i rtsa bar 'gyur pa dang // 'khor ba'i rgyu phyir rim rgyu'i phyir //
analyzed: rtsod pa'i rtsa bar 'gyur pa dang // 'khor ba'i rgyu phyir rim rgyu'i phyir //
translated: They are the root of dispute, the cause of samsara, and the order of the world.

original: sems byung rnams las tshor ba dang // 'du shes logs shig phung por gzhag / phung po dag tu 'dus ma byas //
analyzed: sems byung rnams las tshor ba dang // 'du shes logs shig phung por gzhag / phung po dag tu 'dus ma byas //
translated: From among the mental factors, feeling and discernment are posited as separate aggregates because they are the root of dispute, the cause of samsara, and the order of the world.

original: don du mi rung phyir ma bshad //
analyzed: don du mi rung phyir ma bshad //
translated: Unconditioned states are not explained as aggregates because they are not suitable as objects.

original: rim ni rags dang kun nyon mongs //
analyzed: rim ni rags dang kun nyon mongs //
translated: The order of the aggregates is in accordance with their coarseness, their affliction,

original: snod sogs don khams ji bzhin no //
analyzed: snod sogs don khams ji bzhin no //
translated: and the elements of the world and so on.

original: da lta'i don phyir dang po lnga //
analyzed: da lta'i don phyir dang po lnga //
translated: The first five aggregates are for the sake of present objects.

original: 'byung ba las gyur don phyir bzhi //
analyzed: 'byung ba las gyur don phyir bzhi //
translated: because they are the objects of the four physical sense faculties.🔽Or else, they are in order according to their distance,

original: gzhan ni ches ring myur 'jug phyir //
analyzed: gzhan ni ches ring myur 'jug phyir //
translated: because the object of the nose is closer than that of the eyes,🔽and the object of the tongue is closer than that of the nose.

original: yang na ji ltar gnas bzhin rim //
analyzed: yang na ji ltar gnas bzhin rim //
translated: Or else, they are in order according to their order of enumeration,

original: bye brag don dang gtso bo'i phyir //🔽chos mang ba dang mchog bsdus phyir //
analyzed: bye brag don dang gtso bo'i phyir // chos mang ba dang mchog bsdus phyir //
translated: because the order of enumeration is as stated.

original: gcig ni gzugs kyi skye mched @3a * //
analyzed: gcig ni gzugs kyi skye mched @3a * //
translated: One is the form base,

original: dang ; / gcig ni chos zhes bya bar brjod //
analyzed: dang ; / gcig ni chos zhes bya bar brjod //
translated: and one is called the mental object.🔽The eighty-four thousand aggregates of Dharma

original: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag / gang rnams thub pas gsungs de dag / tshig gam ming yin de dag ni //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po brgyad khri dag / gang rnams thub pas gsungs de dag / tshig gam ming yin de dag ni //
translated: that the Sage taught are either words or names.

original: gzugs dang 'du byed dag tu 'dus //
analyzed: gzugs dang 'du byed dag tu 'dus //
translated: They are included in the form and compositional factors aggregates.🔽Some say that the treatises are the measure.🔽Each topic is a Dharma aggregate.

original: kha cig bstan bcos tshad ces zer //
analyzed: kha cig bstan bcos tshad ces zer //
translated: The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught

original: phung po la sogs gtam re yin //
analyzed: phung po la sogs gtam re yin //
translated: as antidotes to the three types of pride.🔽The aggregates and so on were taught

original: spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por ni //
analyzed: spyod pa rnams kyi gnyen por ni //
translated: as antidotes to the three types of pride.

original: chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs //
analyzed: chos kyi phung po mthun par gsungs //
translated: The aggregates and so on were taught

original: de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par //
analyzed: de bzhin gzhan yang ci rigs par //
translated: as antidotes to the three types of pride.

original: phung po skye mched khams rnams ni //
analyzed: phung po skye mched khams rnams ni //
translated: The aggregates and so on were taught

original: rang gi mtshan nyid legs dpyad de //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid legs dpyad de //
translated: as antidotes to the three types of pride.

original: ji skad bshad par bsdu bar bya //
analyzed: ji skad bshad par bsdu bar bya //
translated: The aggregates and so on were taught🔽as antidotes to the three types

original: bu ga nam mkha'i khams shes bya //
analyzed: bu ga nam mkha'i khams shes bya //
translated: The space element is the cavity.

original: snang dang mun pa dag yin lo //🔽zag dang bcas pa'i rnam shes ni //
analyzed: snang dang mun pa dag yin lo // zag dang bcas pa'i rnam shes ni //
translated: Light and darkness are the visible form of illumination.🔽The consciousness element is the consciousness

original: rnam shes khams yin skye ba'i rten //
analyzed: rnam shes khams yin skye ba'i rten //
translated: associated with the contaminants.

original: bstan yod 'dir ni gzugs gcig pu //
analyzed: bstan yod 'dir ni gzugs gcig pu //
translated: The form element is the only one that is demonstrable.

original: thogs dang bcas pa gzugs can bcu //
analyzed: thogs dang bcas pa gzugs can bcu //
translated: The ten form elements are impeded.

original: lung ma bstan brgyad de dag nyid //
analyzed: lung ma bstan brgyad de dag nyid //
translated: Eight of them are also neutral.

original: gzugs sgra ma gtogs gzhan rnam gsum //
analyzed: gzugs sgra ma gtogs gzhan rnam gsum //
translated: The others are of three kinds.

original: 'dod khams gtogs pa thams cad do //
analyzed: 'dod khams gtogs pa thams cad do //
translated: All are in the realm of desire.

original: gzugs kyi khams na bcu bzhi'o //🔽dri dang ro dang sna dang ni //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams na bcu bzhi'o // dri dang ro dang sna dang ni //
translated: In the form realm there are fourteen.

original: lce yi rnam shes khams ma gtogs //🔽gzugs med gtogs pa yid dang ni //
analyzed: lce yi rnam shes khams ma gtogs // gzugs med gtogs pa yid dang ni //
translated: The elements of smell and taste, and the nose and tongue consciousnesses,🔽are absent in the form realm.🔽The mental faculty, the element of mental objects, and the mental consciousness

original: chos dang yid kyi rnam shes khams //
analyzed: chos dang yid kyi rnam shes khams //
translated: are in the formless realm.

original: de gsum zag bcas zag pa med //
analyzed: de gsum zag bcas zag pa med //
translated: These three are either contaminated or uncontaminated.

original: lhag ma rnams ni zag bcas so //🔽rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa ni //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni zag bcas so // rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa ni //
translated: The rest are only contaminated.

original: rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yin //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i khams lnga yin //
translated: The five consciousnesses are associated with both initial and sustained thought.

original: tha ma gsum ni rnam gsum mo //
analyzed: tha ma gsum ni rnam gsum mo //
translated: The last three are of three kinds.

original: lhag ma rnams ni gnyis ka spangs //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams ni gnyis ka spangs //
translated: The rest are excluded from both.

original: nges par rtog dang rjes dran pa'i //
analyzed: nges par rtog dang rjes dran pa'i //
translated: The mental consciousness is not conceptual in its intrinsic nature, but it is conceptual in the sense that it is associated with mental conception.

original: rnam par rtog pas rnam mi rtog / de dag yid kyi shes rab g-yeng //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pas rnam mi rtog / de dag yid kyi shes rab g-yeng //
translated: It is distracted by mental wisdom and mental memory.

original: yid kyi dran pa thams cad nyid //
analyzed: yid kyi dran pa thams cad nyid //
translated: All mental memory is associated with the mental faculty.

original: dmigs bcas sems kyi khams bdun no //
analyzed: dmigs bcas sems kyi khams bdun no //
translated: The seven mental elements and the part of the phenomena element that is associated with objects are said to have objects.

original: chos kyi phyed kyang ma zin dgu //
analyzed: chos kyi phyed kyang ma zin dgu //
translated: The other half of the phenomena element does not have objects.

original: brgyad po de dag rnams dang sgra //
analyzed: brgyad po de dag rnams dang sgra //
translated: The eight elements that were just mentioned and sound🔽are of two types.

original: dgu po gzhan ni rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: dgu po gzhan ni rnam pa gnyis //
translated: The other nine elements are of two types.

original: reg bya rnam pa gnyis yin te //
analyzed: reg bya rnam pa gnyis yin te //
translated: Tangible objects are of two types.🔽The remaining nine elements that have form

original: lhag ma gzugs can dgu po ni //
analyzed: lhag ma gzugs can dgu po ni //
translated: are derivative form.

original: 'byung gyur chos khams phyogs gcig kyang //
analyzed: 'byung gyur chos khams phyogs gcig kyang //
translated: The form element is also one part of the phenomena element.

original: gzugs can bcu ni bsags pa'o //🔽gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid //
analyzed: gzugs can bcu ni bsags pa'o // gcod byed gcad par bya ba nyid //
translated: The ten elements that have form are composites.

original: phyi rol gyi ni khams bzhi yin //
analyzed: phyi rol gyi ni khams bzhi yin //
translated: The four external elements are that which is cut and that which cuts.

original: de bzhin bsreg bya 'jal @3b byed pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin bsreg bya 'jal @3b byed pa'o //
translated: They are also that which is burned and that which burns.

original: sreg dang gzhal la mi mthun smra //
analyzed: sreg dang gzhal la mi mthun smra //
translated: There is disagreement about that which is weighed and that which weighs.

original: rnam par smin las byung ba dang // rgyas las byung ba nang gi lnga //
analyzed: rnam par smin las byung ba dang // rgyas las byung ba nang gi lnga //
translated: The five internal elements arise from karmic maturation and from enhancement.

original: sgra ni rnam smin las skyes min //
analyzed: sgra ni rnam smin las skyes min //
translated: Sound does not arise from karmic maturation.

original: rgyu mthun las byung rnam smin skyes //
analyzed: rgyu mthun las byung rnam smin skyes //
translated: Sound that is a natural outcome arises from karmic maturation.

original: thogs pa med brgyad gzhan rnam gsum //
analyzed: thogs pa med brgyad gzhan rnam gsum //
translated: The eight that are unimpeded and the others are of three types.

original: rdzas dang ldan gcig tha ma gsum//🔽skad cig ma ste mig dang ni //
analyzed: rdzas dang ldan gcig tha ma gsum// skad cig ma ste mig dang ni //
translated: One that possesses substance and the last three🔽are momentary.🔽The eye and the element of eye consciousness

original: rnam shes khams dag so so dang // lhan cig tu yang 'thob pa yod //
analyzed: rnam shes khams dag so so dang // lhan cig tu yang 'thob pa yod //

original: nang gi bcu gnyis gzugs la sogs //
analyzed: nang gi bcu gnyis gzugs la sogs //

analyzed: ma gtogs chos zhes bya ba ni // sten pa dang bcas lhag ma ni //

analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa dag kyang yin //

analyzed: gang zhig rang gi las mi byed //

analyzed: bcu ni bsgom pas spang bya yin //

original: lnga yang tha ma gsum rnam gsum //
analyzed: lnga yang tha ma gsum rnam gsum //

original: nyon mongs can min mthong spang min //
analyzed: nyon mongs can min mthong spang min //
translated: are not afflicted.🔽Those not derived from the formless realm

original: gzugs min drug pa min skyes min //
analyzed: gzugs min drug pa min skyes min //
translated: and not derived from the sixth are not objects of the mental faculty.

original: mig dang chos kyi khams phyogs ni //
analyzed: mig dang chos kyi khams phyogs ni //
translated: The eye and the part of the phenomena element

original: lta ba yin te rnam pa brgyad //
analyzed: lta ba yin te rnam pa brgyad //
translated: that is view are of eight types.

original: rnam shes lnga dang mtshungs skyes blo //
analyzed: rnam shes lnga dang mtshungs skyes blo //
translated: The mind that arises simultaneously with the five sense consciousnesses

original: nges rtog med phyir lta ma yin //
analyzed: nges rtog med phyir lta ma yin //

original: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong sten bcas //
analyzed: mig gis gzugs rnams mthong sten bcas //

original: de la brten pa'i rnam shes min //
analyzed: de la brten pa'i rnam shes min //

original: gang phyir bar du chod pa yi //
analyzed: gang phyir bar du chod pa yi //
translated: Because it is obstructed in the middle,🔽

analyzed: gzugs ni mthong ba min phyir lo // mig ni gnyis ka dag gis kyang //

original: mthong ste gsal bar mthong phyir ro //
analyzed: mthong ste gsal bar mthong phyir ro //
translated: The eye sees forms of its own level and of other levels.

original: mig dang yid dang rna ba ni //
analyzed: mig dang yid dang rna ba ni //

analyzed: yul dang ma phrad gsum gzhan du //

analyzed: sna la sogs pa gsum gyis ni //

analyzed: yul ni mnyam pa 'dzin par 'dod //

original: tha ma'i rten 'das lnga rnams kyi //
analyzed: tha ma'i rten 'das lnga rnams kyi //

original: de dag lhan cig skyes pa'ang yin //
analyzed: de dag lhan cig skyes pa'ang yin //
translated: are both homogeneous and partially homogeneous.

original: de dag gyur pas 'gyur nyid phyir //
analyzed: de dag gyur pas 'gyur nyid phyir //

original: rten ni mig la sogs pa yin //
analyzed: rten ni mig la sogs pa yin //

original: de phyir thun mong ma yin phyir //
analyzed: de phyir thun mong ma yin phyir //

analyzed: de dag gis ni rnam shes bstan // lus la 'og ma'i mig ma yin //

original: mig gi gong ma'i gzugs ma yin //
analyzed: mig gi gong ma'i gzugs ma yin //
translated: The form of a higher level is not the eye of a lower level.

original: rnam par shes pa'ang de yi gzugs //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'ang de yi gzugs //

analyzed: lus kyi'ang gnyis ka thams cad du //

analyzed: rna ba'ang de bzhin gsum dag ni //

original: thams cad rang gi sa pa nyid //
analyzed: thams cad rang gi sa pa nyid //

original: lus kyi rnam shes 'og dang ni //
analyzed: lus kyi rnam shes 'og dang ni //

original: rang gi sa yid ma nges te //
analyzed: rang gi sa yid ma nges te //

original: gnyis kyis rnam shes phyi yi lnga //
analyzed: gnyis kyis rnam shes phyi yi lnga //

original: 'dus ma byas chos rtag pa'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas chos rtag pa'o //
translated: The unconditioned dharmas are permanent.

original: chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni //
analyzed: chos kyi phyed dang gang dag ni //
translated: Half of the dharmas and those that are

original: bcu gnyis nang gir bshad dbang po //
analyzed: bcu gnyis nang gir bshad dbang po //
translated: explained as the twelve internal faculties.🔽The faculties

original: chos @4a * //🔽mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las //
analyzed: chos @4a * // mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las //
translated: From the Abhidharmakośa,

original: khams bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas dang po'o /
analyzed: khams bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas dang po'o /
translated: the first chapter called “The Presentation of the Elements.”

original: // / lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la //
analyzed: // / lnga po rnams ni don bzhi la //

original: dbang byed bzhi rnams gnyis la lo //
analyzed: dbang byed bzhi rnams gnyis la lo //

original: lnga dang brgyad po de rnams ni //
analyzed: lnga dang brgyad po de rnams ni //

analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs rnam byang la ; / rang gi don dang thams cad la //
translated: control affliction and purification.🔽The six faculties control the objects of oneself and all.

original: dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug / mo nyid pho nyid la dbang phyir //
analyzed: dmigs par dbang byed phyir dbang drug / mo nyid pho nyid la dbang phyir //
translated: Because of controlling the objects of women and men,🔽the faculties of female and male are established.

analyzed: lus las mo dang pho dbang dag / rigs gnas kun nas nyon mongs dang // rnam par byang la dbang byed phyir //

original: srog dang tshor ba rnams dang ni //
analyzed: srog dang tshor ba rnams dang ni //
translated: life force, the feelings,

original: dad sogs dbang po lngar 'dod do //
analyzed: dad sogs dbang po lngar 'dod do //

analyzed: mya ngan 'das sogs gong nas gong // 'thob pa la ni dbang byed phyir //
translated: The faculties of understanding all, having understood all, and possessing understanding all are the faculties of the three aryas.

analyzed: / kun shes byed dang kun shes dang // de bzhin kun shes ldan dbang po //

original: sems kyi rten dang de'i bye brag / gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid //
analyzed: sems kyi rten dang de'i bye brag / gnas dang kun nas nyon mongs nyid //

original: tshogs dang rnam byang ji snyed pa //
analyzed: tshogs dang rnam byang ji snyed pa //

original: dbang po dag kyang de snyed du //
analyzed: dbang po dag kyang de snyed du //

original: yang na 'jug pa'i rten dang ni //
analyzed: yang na 'jug pa'i rten dang ni //

original: skye dang gnas dang nyer spyod las //
analyzed: skye dang gnas dang nyer spyod las //

analyzed: bcu bzhi de bzhin ldog pa la // dbang po rnams ni gzhan yin no //

original: lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang //
analyzed: lus tshor sim pa ma yin gang //

analyzed: sdug bsngal dbang po'o sim pa ni// bde ba'o bsam gtan gsum pa na //
translated: are the faculty of suffering.🔽Mental satisfaction is the faculty of pleasure.

original: sems kyi de ni bde dbang po //
analyzed: sems kyi de ni bde dbang po //
translated: In the third absorption, mental satisfaction is the faculty of pleasure.

original: gzhan na de yid bde ba yin //🔽sems kyi sim pa ma yin pa //
analyzed: gzhan na de yid bde ba yin // sems kyi sim pa ma yin pa //

original: yid mi bde ba'o btang snyoms ni //
analyzed: yid mi bde ba'o btang snyoms ni //

original: bar ma'o gnyis ka'i mi rtog phyir //
analyzed: bar ma'o gnyis ka'i mi rtog phyir //

original: mthong bsgom mi slob lam la dgu //
analyzed: mthong bsgom mi slob lam la dgu //

original: gsum yin gsum ni dri ma med //
analyzed: gsum yin gsum ni dri ma med //

original: gzugs can srog dang sdug bsngal dag / zag dang bcas pa dgu rnam gnyis //
analyzed: gzugs can srog dang sdug bsngal dag / zag dang bcas pa dgu rnam gnyis //

original: srog ni rnam smin bcu gnyis gnyis //
analyzed: srog ni rnam smin bcu gnyis gnyis //

original: tha ma brgyad dang yid mi bde //🔽ma gtogs pa ste de gcig ni //
analyzed: tha ma brgyad dang yid mi bde // ma gtogs pa ste de gcig ni //

original: rnam par smin bcas bcu rnam gnyis //
analyzed: rnam par smin bcas bcu rnam gnyis //

original: yid dang tshor gzhan dad la sogs //
analyzed: yid dang tshor gzhan dad la sogs //

original: dge ba brgyad yid mi bde ba //
analyzed: dge ba brgyad yid mi bde ba //

original: rnam gnyis yid dang tshor gzhan ni //
analyzed: rnam gnyis yid dang tshor gzhan ni //

analyzed: rnam gsum gzhan ni rnam pa gcig / dri med ma gtogs 'dod par gtogs //

analyzed: pho mo'i dbang dang sdug bsngal dag / ma gtogs gzugs gtogs gzugs can @4b dang ; / bde ba'ang ma gtogs gzugs med gtogs //

original: yid dang tshor ba gsum rnam gsum //
analyzed: yid dang tshor ba gsum rnam gsum //

original: gnyis kyis spang bya yid mi bde //
analyzed: gnyis kyis spang bya yid mi bde //

original: dgu ni bsgom pas lnga po ni //
analyzed: dgu ni bsgom pas lnga po ni //

original: spang bar bya min yang gsum min //
analyzed: spang bar bya min yang gsum min //

original: 'dod par dang por rnam smin gnyis //
analyzed: 'dod par dang por rnam smin gnyis //

original: rnyed de rdzus te skye bas min //
analyzed: rnyed de rdzus te skye bas min //

original: de yis drug gam bdun nam brgyad //
analyzed: de yis drug gam bdun nam brgyad //
translated: By that, six, seven, or eight.🔽In the form realm, six. In the higher realms, one.

original: gzugs na drug go gong mar gcig / gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni //
analyzed: gzugs na drug go gong mar gcig / gzugs med dag tu 'chi ba ni //
translated: At death in the formless realm,

original: srog dang yid dang btang snyoms nyid //
analyzed: srog dang yid dang btang snyoms nyid //

original: 'gag par 'gyur ro gzugs na brgyad //
analyzed: 'gag par 'gyur ro gzugs na brgyad //

original: 'dod par bcu'am dgu'am brgyad //
analyzed: 'dod par bcu'am dgu'am brgyad //
translated: In the desire realm, ten, nine, or eight.

original: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi //
analyzed: rim gyis 'chi ba dag la bzhi //

original: dge la thams cad dag tu lnga //
analyzed: dge la thams cad dag tu lnga //

original: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus 'thob //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha ma gnyis dgus 'thob //

original: gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus //
analyzed: gnyis ni bdun dang brgyad dang dgus //

original: bcu gcig dag gis dgra bcom nyid //
analyzed: bcu gcig dag gis dgra bcom nyid //

original: 'ga' zhig srid phyir bshad pa yin //
analyzed: 'ga' zhig srid phyir bshad pa yin //
translated: Because some are possible, it is explained.

original: btang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni //
analyzed: btang snyoms dang ni srog dang ni //
translated: Those possessing equanimity, life,

original: yid dang ldan la nges gsum ldan //
analyzed: yid dang ldan la nges gsum ldan //
translated: and mind definitely possess three.🔽Those possessing a body possess four.

original: bde lus ldan la bzhi dag dang // mig sogs ldan la lnga dang ldan //
analyzed: bde lus ldan la bzhi dag dang // mig sogs ldan la lnga dang ldan //
translated: Those possessing eyes possess five.

original: yid bde ldan yang sdug bsngal ldan //
analyzed: yid bde ldan yang sdug bsngal ldan //
translated: Those possessing mental satisfaction also possess pain.

original: bdun dang mo yi dbang sogs ldan //
analyzed: bdun dang mo yi dbang sogs ldan //
translated: Those possessing seven possess the female organ, and so on.

original: brgyad dang kun shes ldan pa yi //
analyzed: brgyad dang kun shes ldan pa yi //
translated: Those possessing eight faculties and those possessing the faculty of complete knowledge

original: dbang po ldan la bcu gcig ldan //
analyzed: dbang po ldan la bcu gcig ldan //
translated: possess eleven.

original: kun shes byed pa'i dbang ldan la //
analyzed: kun shes byed pa'i dbang ldan la //
translated: Those possessing the faculty producing complete knowledge

original: bcu gsum dag dang ldan pa yin //
analyzed: bcu gsum dag dang ldan pa yin //
translated: possess thirteen.

original: dge med nang na nyung ldan pa //
analyzed: dge med nang na nyung ldan pa //
translated: Those lacking virtue possess the least

original: lus tshor srog yid brgyad dang ldan //
analyzed: lus tshor srog yid brgyad dang ldan //

original: gzugs med byis pa'ang de bzhin te //
analyzed: gzugs med byis pa'ang de bzhin te //
translated: So too, those in the formless realm and those who are infants.🔽Those possessing many possess nineteen:

original: btang snyoms srog yid dge rnams dang // mang por ldan la bcu dgu ste //
analyzed: btang snyoms srog yid dge rnams dang // mang por ldan la bcu dgu ste //
translated: the five virtues, equanimity, life, and mind,

original: dri ma med rnams ma gtogs so //
analyzed: dri ma med rnams ma gtogs so //
translated: excluding the stainless.

original: mtshan gnyis 'phags pa chags bcas te //
analyzed: mtshan gnyis 'phags pa chags bcas te //

original: mtshan gcig dri med gnyis ma gtogs //
analyzed: mtshan gcig dri med gnyis ma gtogs //

original: 'dod na dbang po med pa dang // sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad //
analyzed: 'dod na dbang po med pa dang // sgra med phra rab rdul rdzas brgyad //
translated: In the desire realm, those lacking faculties and those lacking sound possess eight substances.

original: lus dbang ldan la rdzas dgu'o //
analyzed: lus dbang ldan la rdzas dgu'o //
translated: Those possessing the body faculty possess nine substances.

original: dbang po gzhan ldan rdzas bcu'o //
analyzed: dbang po gzhan ldan rdzas bcu'o //
translated: Those possessing other faculties possess ten substances.🔽Mind and mental factors are definitely concomitant.🔽All conditioned phenomena possess the characteristics of conditioned phenomena,

analyzed: sems dang sems byung nges lhan cig / thams cad 'dus byas mtshan nyid dang // thob pa'am sems byung rnam lnga ste //
translated: acquisition, or the five types of mental factors.

original: sa mang la sogs tha dad phyir //
analyzed: sa mang la sogs tha dad phyir //
translated: Because there are differences in the universal mental states and so on.

original: tshor dang sems pa 'du shes dang // 'dun dang reg dang blo gros dran //🔽yid la byed dang mos pa dang // ting nge 'dzin @5a * //
analyzed: tshor dang sems pa 'du shes dang // 'dun dang reg dang blo gros dran // yid la byed dang mos pa dang // ting nge 'dzin @5a * //
translated: Feeling, conception, volition,🔽Contact, discernment, and attention.

original: sems thams cad la //
analyzed: sems thams cad la //
translated: These seven mental factors are found in all minds.

original: dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs //
analyzed: dad dang bag yod shin tu sbyangs //
translated: Faith, diligence, pliancy,

original: btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod //
analyzed: btang snyoms ngo tsha shes khrel yod //

original: rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang // brtson 'grus rtag tu dge la 'byung //
analyzed: rtsa ba gnyis rnam mi 'tshe dang // brtson 'grus rtag tu dge la 'byung //
translated: The two roots, nonviolence, and effort always occur in virtuous minds.🔽Delusion, nonconscientiousness, laziness,

original: rmongs dang bag med le lo dang // ma dad pa dang rmugs dang rgod //
analyzed: rmongs dang bag med le lo dang // ma dad pa dang rmugs dang rgod //
translated: Lack of faith, lethargy, and excitation

original: nyon mongs can la rtag tu 'byung //
analyzed: nyon mongs can la rtag tu 'byung //
translated: Always occur in afflicted minds.🔽Nonconscience and shamelessness

original: mi dge la ni khrel med dang // ngo tsha med pa'o khro ba dang // khon du 'dzin dang g-yo dang ni //
analyzed: mi dge la ni khrel med dang // ngo tsha med pa'o khro ba dang // khon du 'dzin dang g-yo dang ni //

original: phrag dog 'tshig 'chab ser sna dang // sgyu dang rgyags dang rnam 'tshe ni //
analyzed: phrag dog 'tshig 'chab ser sna dang // sgyu dang rgyags dang rnam 'tshe ni //

original: nyon mongs chung ngu'i sa pa rnams //
analyzed: nyon mongs chung ngu'i sa pa rnams //

original: 'dod pa'i dge ba'i sems la ni //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dge ba'i sems la ni //
translated: In a virtuous mind of the desire realm,

original: rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rtog dang dpyod dang bcas pa'i phyir //

original: sems las byung ba nyi shu gnyis //
analyzed: sems las byung ba nyi shu gnyis //

original: la la dag tu 'gyod pa bsnan //
analyzed: la la dag tu 'gyod pa bsnan //
translated: In some instances, regret is added.

original: mi dge ba ni ma 'dres dang // lta dang ldan la'ang nyi shu 'byung //🔽nyon mongs bzhi dang khro sogs dang // 'gyod pa dang ni nyi shu gcig / bsgribs la bco brgyad lung ma bstan //
analyzed: mi dge ba ni ma 'dres dang // lta dang ldan la'ang nyi shu 'byung // nyon mongs bzhi dang khro sogs dang // 'gyod pa dang ni nyi shu gcig / bsgribs la bco brgyad lung ma bstan //
translated: Twenty occur in the unmixed nonvirtuous mind and in the mind possessing view.🔽Twenty one occur in the obscured mind and in the mind possessing the four afflictions, anger and so on and regret.

original: gzhan la bcu gnyis dag tu 'dod //
analyzed: gzhan la bcu gnyis dag tu 'dod //
translated: Eighteen occur in the unobscured neutral mind and twelve are asserted in others.

original: gnyid ni kun la mi 'gal phyir //
analyzed: gnyid ni kun la mi 'gal phyir //
translated: Sleep is not contradictory for any because

original: gang la yod pa de bsnan no //
analyzed: gang la yod pa de bsnan no //
translated: it is added to any mind in which it exists.

original: de las 'gyod gnyid mi dge rnams //
analyzed: de las 'gyod gnyid mi dge rnams //
translated: From among those, regret and sleep are nonvirtuous

original: bsam gtan dang po dag na med //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po dag na med //
translated: and do not exist in the first absorption.

original: rtog pa'ang bsam gtan khyad par can //
analyzed: rtog pa'ang bsam gtan khyad par can //
translated: Also investigation does not exist in the special absorption

original: de yi gong na dpyod pa yang //
analyzed: de yi gong na dpyod pa yang //
translated: and analysis does not exist above that.

original: ma gus ngo tsha med khrel med //
analyzed: ma gus ngo tsha med khrel med //
translated: Nonembarrassment is shamelessness and nonvirtuous nonembarrassment.

original: kha na ma tho 'jigs mi lta //
analyzed: kha na ma tho 'jigs mi lta //
translated: It does not view shame as a fault or fear.

original: dga' dang gus nyid ngo tsha shes //
analyzed: dga' dang gus nyid ngo tsha shes //
translated: Delight and respect are shame.

original: de gnyis 'dod dang gzugs dag na //
analyzed: de gnyis 'dod dang gzugs dag na //
translated: Those two exist in the desire realm and form realm.

original: rtog dang dpyod pa rtsing zhib nyid //
analyzed: rtog dang dpyod pa rtsing zhib nyid //
translated: Investigation and analysis are coarseness and subtlety.

original: nga rgyal khengs pa rgyags pa ni //
analyzed: nga rgyal khengs pa rgyags pa ni //
translated: Arrogance, haughtiness and vanity

original: rang gi chos la chags pa yi //
analyzed: rang gi chos la chags pa yi //
translated: are attachment to one's own qualities.

original: sems ni yongs su gtugs pa'o//
analyzed: sems ni yongs su gtugs pa'o//
translated: The mind is fully investigated.

original: sems dang yid dang rnam shes ni //
analyzed: sems dang yid dang rnam shes ni //
translated: Mind, thought, and consciousness🔽are equivalent.🔽The mind and mental factors🔽are associated in five ways:🔽support, focal object,

original: don gcig sems dang sems byung dang // rten dang dmigs dang rnam bcas dang // mtshungs par ldan pa'ang rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: don gcig sems dang sems byung dang // rten dang dmigs dang rnam bcas dang // mtshungs par ldan pa'ang rnam pa lnga //
translated: and aspect, as well as possession.

original: mi ldan pa yi 'du byed rnams //
analyzed: mi ldan pa yi 'du byed rnams //
translated: Nonassociated compositional factors🔽are acquisition, nonacquisition,🔽homogeneous character,🔽the meditative absorptions of nondiscernment and cessation,

original: thob dang ma thob skal mnyam dang // 'du shes med snyoms 'jug pa dang ; / srog dang mtshan nyid rnams dang ni //
analyzed: thob dang ma thob skal mnyam dang // 'du shes med snyoms 'jug pa dang ; / srog dang mtshan nyid rnams dang ni //
translated: life force, the characteristics,

original: ming gi tshogs la sogs pa yang //🔽thob pa rnyed dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: ming gi tshogs la sogs pa yang // thob pa rnyed dang ldan pa'o //
translated: and the collections of names, etc.🔽Acquisition is attainment and possession.

original: thob dang ma thob rnyed rgyud du //
analyzed: thob dang ma thob rnyed rgyud du //
translated: Attainment and nonattainment🔽are of those that are related to the mindstream.

original: gtogs pa rnams kyi'o 'gog gnyis kyi //
analyzed: gtogs pa rnams kyi'o 'gog gnyis kyi //
translated: The two cessations

original: dus gsum pa yi rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: dus gsum pa yi rnam pa gsum //
translated: are of those of the three times.

original: dge la sogs kyi dge la sogs //
analyzed: dge la sogs kyi dge la sogs //
translated: Virtue, etc., are of virtue, etc.

original: der @5b gtogs rnams kyi rang khams pa //
analyzed: der @5b gtogs rnams kyi rang khams pa //
translated: Those belonging there are of their own realm.

original: ma gtogs rnams kyi rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: ma gtogs rnams kyi rnam pa bzhi //
translated: Those not belonging there are of four kinds.

original: slob dang mi slob min gyi gsum //
analyzed: slob dang mi slob min gyi gsum //
translated: Those of the learner and those of the nonlearner are of three kinds.

original: spang bya min pa'i rnam gnyis 'dod //
analyzed: spang bya min pa'i rnam gnyis 'dod //
translated: Those not to be abandoned are asserted to be of two kinds.

original: lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye //
analyzed: lung bstan min thob lhan cig skye //
translated: Those not declared are obtained simultaneously.

original: mngon shes sprul pa ma gtogs pa //🔽bsgribs pa'i gzugs kyi'ang 'dod pa na //
analyzed: mngon shes sprul pa ma gtogs pa // bsgribs pa'i gzugs kyi'ang 'dod pa na //
translated: Except for emanations, the formless realm possesses the five: the mental faculty, the sensation of equanimity, the five omnipresent mental factors, and the two stainless states.

original: gzugs kyi sngar ni skye ba med //
analyzed: gzugs kyi sngar ni skye ba med //
translated: The formless realm does not arise prior to the form realm.

original: ma thob ma bsgribs lung ma bstan //
analyzed: ma thob ma bsgribs lung ma bstan //
translated: Nonobtainment is unobscured neutral.

original: 'das ma skyes kyi de rnam gsum //
analyzed: 'das ma skyes kyi de rnam gsum //
translated: Past and future states have three types.

original: 'dod sogs gtogs dang dri med kyi'ang //🔽lam ma thob pa so so yi //
analyzed: 'dod sogs gtogs dang dri med kyi'ang // lam ma thob pa so so yi //
translated: Those belonging to the desire realm and so on and the stainless🔽are asserted to be the individual states of ordinary beings who have not obtained the ārya path.

original: skye bor 'dod do de thob dang // sa 'phos nas ni rnam nyams 'gyur //
analyzed: skye bor 'dod do de thob dang // sa 'phos nas ni rnam nyams 'gyur //
translated: They are lost through obtaining the ārya path and through changing level.

original: skal mnyam sems can 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: skal mnyam sems can 'dra ba'o //
translated: Homogeneity is the similarity of sentient beings.

original: 'du shes med pa pa 'du shes //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa pa 'du shes //
translated: The meditative attainment of nondiscernment is the🔽cessation of mind and mental factors

original: med par sems dang sems byung rnams //
analyzed: med par sems dang sems byung rnams //
translated: due to the absence of discernment.

original: 'gog pa'o rnam smin de 'bras che //
analyzed: 'gog pa'o rnam smin de 'bras che //
translated: It is karmic maturation and its result is great.

original: de bzhin 'du shes med snyoms 'jug / bsam gtan tha mar 'byung 'dod pas //
analyzed: de bzhin 'du shes med snyoms 'jug / bsam gtan tha mar 'byung 'dod pas //
translated: Similarly, the meditative attainment of nondiscernment arises in the final absorption.

original: dge ba'o skyes nas myong 'gyur nyid //
analyzed: dge ba'o skyes nas myong 'gyur nyid //
translated: It is virtuous and is experienced after rebirth.

original: 'phags pa'i ma yin dus gcig 'thob //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i ma yin dus gcig 'thob //
translated: It is not of āryas and is obtained in one instant.

original: 'gog pa zhes pa'ang de bzhin nyid //
analyzed: 'gog pa zhes pa'ang de bzhin nyid //
translated: Cessation is also like that.

original: 'di gnas don du srid rtse skyes //
analyzed: 'di gnas don du srid rtse skyes //
translated: It arises in the summit of existence for the purpose of abiding in that state.

original: dge ba'o gnyis su myong 'gyur dang // ma nges 'phags pa'i sbyor bas 'thob //
analyzed: dge ba'o gnyis su myong 'gyur dang // ma nges 'phags pa'i sbyor bas 'thob //
translated: Virtue is twofold: to be experienced in this life, and in the next life.

original: thub pa'i byang chub kyis thob bya //
analyzed: thub pa'i byang chub kyis thob bya //
translated: The Buddha obtained it through enlightenment.

original: dang por ma yin skad cig ma //
analyzed: dang por ma yin skad cig ma //
translated: The first is not, because it is momentary.

original: sum cu rtsa bzhis thob phyir ro //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa bzhis thob phyir ro //
translated: Because it is obtained through thirty-four moments.

original: gnyis ka 'dod dang gzugs rten can //
analyzed: gnyis ka 'dod dang gzugs rten can //
translated: Both are based in the desire and form realms.

original: 'gog pa dang por mi'i nang du //
analyzed: 'gog pa dang por mi'i nang du //
translated: The first cessation is in the human realm.

original: srog ni tshe yin drod dang ni //🔽rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: srog ni tshe yin drod dang ni // rnam shes rten gang yin pa'o //
translated: Life is life force, heat, and consciousness.

original: mtshan nyid dag ni skye ba dang // rga dang gnas dang mi rtag nyid //
analyzed: mtshan nyid dag ni skye ba dang // rga dang gnas dang mi rtag nyid //
translated: The characteristics are birth, aging, duration, and impermanence.

original: de dag skye ba'i skyes la sogs //
analyzed: de dag skye ba'i skyes la sogs //
translated: They are the birth of birth, and so on.

original: de chos brgyad dang gcig la 'jug / rgyu dang rkyen dag med par ni //
analyzed: de chos brgyad dang gcig la 'jug / rgyu dang rkyen dag med par ni //
translated: They engage in eight and one thing.

original: skye bas bskyed bya skyed byed min //🔽ming gi tshogs la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: skye bas bskyed bya skyed byed min // ming gi tshogs la sogs pa ni //
translated: Birth does not produce the produced without causes and conditions.🔽The collection of names and so on

original: ming dang ngag dang yi ge'i tshogs //
analyzed: ming dang ngag dang yi ge'i tshogs //
translated: Are collections of names, phrases, and letters.

original: 'dod dang gzugs gtogs sems can ston //
analyzed: 'dod dang gzugs gtogs sems can ston //
translated: They belong to the desire and form realms.

original: rgyu mthun lung bstan min de bzhin //
analyzed: rgyu mthun lung bstan min de bzhin //
translated: They are taught to be similar to the neutral.

original: skal mnyam rnam par smin pa'ang yin //
analyzed: skal mnyam rnam par smin pa'ang yin //
translated: They are homogeneous and also karmic maturation.

original: khams gsum pa ste thob rnam gnyis //
analyzed: khams gsum pa ste thob rnam gnyis //
translated: The three realms are obtained in two ways.🔽The characteristics are also meditative attainment,

original: mtshan nyid rnams kyang snyoms 'jug dang // mi ldan pa dag rgyu mthun pa //
analyzed: mtshan nyid rnams kyang snyoms 'jug dang // mi ldan pa dag rgyu mthun pa //
translated: nonpossession,🔽The productive cause, the coemergent cause,

original: byed rgyu lhan cig 'byung ba dang // skal mnyam mtshungs par ldan pa dang // @6a * //
analyzed: byed rgyu lhan cig 'byung ba dang // skal mnyam mtshungs par ldan pa dang // @6a * //
translated: the homogeneous cause, the concomitant cause,🔽the universal cause, and the cause of ripening

original: kun tu 'gro dang rnam smin dang / rgyu ni rnam pa drug tu 'dod //
analyzed: kun tu 'gro dang rnam smin dang / rgyu ni rnam pa drug tu 'dod //
translated: are asserted to be the six types of causes.

original: rang las gzhan pa byed rgyu'i rgyu //
analyzed: rang las gzhan pa byed rgyu'i rgyu //
translated: The productive cause is a cause that is different from its effect.

original: lhan cig 'byung gang phan tshun 'bras //
analyzed: lhan cig 'byung gang phan tshun 'bras //
translated: Coemergent causes are those that are mutually resultant.🔽Like the primary elements, the mind and mental factors,

original: 'byung bzhin sems kyi rjes 'jug dang // sems dang mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi bzhin //
analyzed: 'byung bzhin sems kyi rjes 'jug dang // sems dang mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi bzhin //
translated: the two vows, and the mind and their characteristics,🔽the mental factors, the two vows,🔽and the mind and their characteristics

original: sems las byung dang sdom gnyis dang // sems dang de dag gi mtshan nyid //
analyzed: sems las byung dang sdom gnyis dang // sems dang de dag gi mtshan nyid //
translated: are coemergent causes in relation to each other.

original: sems kyi rjes 'jug dus dang ni //
analyzed: sems kyi rjes 'jug dus dang ni //
translated: They are coemergent causes in relation to time,🔽in relation to virtue and so on,

original: 'bras sogs dge la sogs pas so //
analyzed: 'bras sogs dge la sogs pas so //
translated: and in relation to the result and so forth.

original: skal mnyam rgyu ni 'dra ba'o //🔽rang rigs sa pa'o sngar skyes rnams //
analyzed: skal mnyam rgyu ni 'dra ba'o // rang rigs sa pa'o sngar skyes rnams //
translated: The homogeneous cause is similar.🔽Those that are similar and of the same level🔽are homogeneous causes of each other.

original: sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du //
analyzed: sa dgu'i lam ni phan tshun du //
translated: The paths of the nine levels are

original: mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin //
analyzed: mnyam dang khyad par can gyi yin //
translated: homogeneous causes of each other.

original: sbyor byung de gnyis kho na'i yin //
analyzed: sbyor byung de gnyis kho na'i yin //
translated: They are the results of both the first two causes.🔽The results of the cause of conscious effort

original: thos dang bsams byung la sogs pa //
analyzed: thos dang bsams byung la sogs pa //
translated: are the results of hearing, contemplation, etc.🔽The concomitant cause is the mind and mental factors

original: mtshungs ldan rgyu ni sems dag dang // sems byung rten mtshungs can rnams so //
analyzed: mtshungs ldan rgyu ni sems dag dang // sems byung rten mtshungs can rnams so //
translated: that have a similar support.

original: kun 'gro zhes bya nyon mongs can //
analyzed: kun 'gro zhes bya nyon mongs can //
translated: The omnipresent cause is the afflicted🔽view of the self and so on.

original: rnams kyi rang sa kun 'gro snga //
analyzed: rnams kyi rang sa kun 'gro snga //
translated: The omnipresent cause of afflicted🔽views is the afflicted view of the self.

analyzed: rnam smin rgyu ni mi dge dang // dge ba zag bcas rnams kho na //

original: kun 'gro skal mnyam dus gnyis pa //
analyzed: kun 'gro skal mnyam dus gnyis pa //
translated: The omnipresent cause of the afflicted

original: gsum po dag ni dus gsum pa //
analyzed: gsum po dag ni dus gsum pa //
translated: view of the self is the afflicted view of the self.🔽The omnipresent cause of the afflicted

original: 'dus byas bral bcas 'bras bu yin //
analyzed: 'dus byas bral bcas 'bras bu yin //
translated: view of the self is the afflicted view of the self.

original: 'dus ma byas la de dag med //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas la de dag med //
translated: The omnipresent cause of the afflicted🔽view of the self is the afflicted view of the self.

original: rnam smin 'bras bu tha ma'i yin //
analyzed: rnam smin 'bras bu tha ma'i yin //

original: bdag po'i 'bras bu dang po'i yin //
analyzed: bdag po'i 'bras bu dang po'i yin //
translated: view of the self is the afflicted view of the self.🔽The omnipresent cause of the afflicted🔽view of the self is the afflicted view of the self.

analyzed: rgyu mthun skal mnyam kun 'gro ba'i //

analyzed: skyes bu pa ni gnyis kyi yin //
translated: view of the self is the afflicted view of the self.

analyzed: rnam smin lung du ma bstan chos //

analyzed: sems can brjod lung bstan phyis 'byung //

analyzed: bral ba blo yis zad pa'o //
translated: view of the self is the afflicted view of the self.🔽The omnipresent cause of the afflicted🔽view

analyzed: gang gi stobs kyis gang skyes pa'i //
translated: The power of which gives rise to which?🔽

original: 'bras de skyes bu byed las skyes//
analyzed: 'bras de skyes bu byed las skyes//
translated: The result that arises by the power of that is a result of conscious effort.

original: sngon byung ma yin 'dus byas ni //🔽'dus byas kho na'i bdag po'i 'bras //
analyzed: sngon byung ma yin 'dus byas ni // 'dus byas kho na'i bdag po'i 'bras //

analyzed: lnga po da ltar 'bras bu 'dzin //

original: gnyis ni rab tu 'byin par byed //
analyzed: gnyis ni rab tu 'byin par byed //

analyzed: da ltar gyi dang 'das pa dag / gcig ni 'das pas 'byin par 'gyur //
translated: One is projected by the past and present.

original: nyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes //
analyzed: nyon mongs can dang rnam smin skyes //
translated: The afflicted and the maturational

analyzed: lhag dang dang po 'phags rim bzhin //

analyzed: rnam smin kun 'gro de gnyis dang // skal mnyam ma gtogs lhag las skyes // sems dang sems las byung ba yin //

original: byed rgyu zhes bya bdag por bshad //
analyzed: byed rgyu zhes bya bdag por bshad //
translated: The active cause is explained as the dominant condition.

original: rgyu gnyis po dag 'gag pa la //
analyzed: rgyu gnyis po dag 'gag pa la //
translated: The two causes are active in relation to cessation.

original: bya ba byed do gsum po ni //🔽skye la'o de las gzhan pa yi //
analyzed: bya ba byed do gsum po ni // skye la'o de las gzhan pa yi //
translated: The three are active in relation to arising.

original: rkyen dag de las bzlog pa yin //
analyzed: rkyen dag de las bzlog pa yin //
translated: The other conditions are the opposite of that.

original: bzhi yis sems dang sems byung rnams //
analyzed: bzhi yis sems dang sems byung rnams //
translated: The four conditions give rise to minds and mental factors.

original: gsum gyis snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis //
analyzed: gsum gyis snyoms par 'jug pa gnyis //
translated: The three give rise to the two meditative attainments.

original: gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye //
analyzed: gzhan ni gnyis po dag las skye //
translated: The others arise from both.

original: dbang phyug sogs min rim sogs phyir //
analyzed: dbang phyug sogs min rim sogs phyir //
translated: They are not from Īśvara, etc., because of sequence, etc.

original: de'i rgyu 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: de'i rgyu 'byung ba rnam pa gnyis //
translated: Its cause is the two kinds of elements.

original: 'byung las gyur pa'i rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: 'byung las gyur pa'i rnam pa lnga //
translated: The derivative elements are of five kinds.

original: 'byung gyur rnam gsum phan tshun du //
analyzed: 'byung gyur rnam gsum phan tshun du //
translated: The derivative elements are of three kinds.🔽The elements are of one kind.🔽In the desire realm, the virtuous and nonvirtuous minds and the obscured and unobscured minds

original: 'byung ba rnams kyi de rnam gcig /'dod yid dge dang mi dge dang // bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa //
analyzed: 'byung ba rnams kyi de rnam gcig /'dod yid dge dang mi dge dang // bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa //
translated: arise from the virtuous mind of the desire realm.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa dag na //
translated: In the form and formless realms,

original: mi dge las gzhan zag med gnyis //
analyzed: mi dge las gzhan zag med gnyis //
translated: the two uncontaminated minds arise from the virtuous mind.

original: 'dod sems dge ba las sems dgu //🔽de ni brgyad po kho na las //
analyzed: 'dod sems dge ba las sems dgu // de ni brgyad po kho na las //
translated: From the virtuous mind of the desire realm, nine minds can arise.🔽That is, from the virtuous mind of the desire realm, nine minds can arise.

original: mi dge ba ni bcu dag las //
analyzed: mi dge ba ni bcu dag las //
translated: From the nonvirtuous mind, ten minds can arise.

original: de las bzhi ste bsgribs de bzhin //
analyzed: de las bzhi ste bsgribs de bzhin //
translated: There are four from that, obscured.

original: ma bsgribs pa ni lnga dag las //
analyzed: ma bsgribs pa ni lnga dag las //

analyzed: de las mjug thogs sems bdun no //

analyzed: gzugs na dge las bcu gcig go //

analyzed: de ni dgu yi mjug thogs su //

analyzed: bsgribs pa brgyad las de las drug / ma bsgribs pa ni gsum las so //

analyzed: de yi tshul lo dge ba las //

analyzed: de las sems ni bzhi dag go //

analyzed: bcu gnyis de dag nyi shur yang //

analyzed: rnam smin skyes dang spyod lam pa //

analyzed: gzugs na bzo ma gtogs pa'o //

analyzed: gzugs khams yin der so so yi // bsam gtan sa ni gsum pa yin // bzhi pa sa ni brgyad pa yin // gzugs med khams na gnas med do //
translated: The formless realm is the highest.🔽The formless realm is the highest.🔽The formless realm is the highest.

original: skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi //🔽der ni ris dang srog la yang //
analyzed: skye ba las ni rnam pa bzhi // der ni ris dang srog la yang //
translated: The formless realm is the highest.🔽The formless realm is the highest.

original: sems kyi rgyud ni rten pa yin //🔽der ni dmyal sogs 'gro ba lnga //
analyzed: sems kyi rgyud ni rten pa yin // der ni dmyal sogs 'gro ba lnga //
translated: The formless realm is the highest.

original: rang gi ming gis bstan de dag //
analyzed: rang gi ming gis bstan de dag //
translated: The formless realm is the highest.

original: nyon mongs can min lung bstan min //
analyzed: nyon mongs can min lung bstan min //
translated: It is not defiled, nor is it declared.

original: sems can zhes bya bar srid min //
analyzed: sems can zhes bya bar srid min //
translated: It is not a sentient being, nor is it a non-sentient being.🔽Different body and different ideation, different body and the same ideation,🔽the opposite, the same body and the same ideation, and the formless.

original: lus dang 'du shes tha dad dang // lus tha dad cing 'du shes gcig / bzlog dang lus dang 'du shes gcig / gzugs can ma yin gsum po dag / rnam shes gnas pa bdun lhag ma //
analyzed: lus dang 'du shes tha dad dang // lus tha dad cing 'du shes gcig / bzlog dang lus dang 'du shes gcig / gzugs can ma yin gsum po dag / rnam shes gnas pa bdun lhag ma //
translated: The remaining three abodes of consciousness are the summit of existence,

original: de 'joms byed ldan srid rtse dang ; /'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: de 'joms byed ldan srid rtse dang ; /'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams //
translated: the beings of the base of nothingness, and those possessing the destroyer.

original: sems can gyi ni gnas dgur bshad //
analyzed: sems can gyi ni gnas dgur bshad //
translated: These are explained as the nine abodes of sentient beings.

original: mi 'dod bzhin gnas phyir gzhan min //
analyzed: mi 'dod bzhin gnas phyir gzhan min //
translated: They are not other abodes because they abide unwillingly.

original: gnas pa dag ni yang bzhi ste //
analyzed: gnas pa dag ni yang bzhi ste //
translated: There are also four other abodes:

original: zag dang bcas pa'i phung po bzhi //🔽rang gi sa pa nyid rnam shes //
analyzed: zag dang bcas pa'i phung po bzhi // rang gi sa pa nyid rnam shes //
translated: the four contaminated aggregates.

original: 'ba' zhig gnas par ma bshad do //
analyzed: 'ba' zhig gnas par ma bshad do //
translated: Consciousness alone is not explained as an abode.

original: bsdu na mu ni bzhi yin no //
analyzed: bsdu na mu ni bzhi yin no //
translated: When summarized, there are four possibilities.

original: der ni sgo nga las skyes sogs //
analyzed: der ni sgo nga las skyes sogs //
translated: There, those born from eggs and so on

original: sems can skye gnas bzhi dag tu //
analyzed: sems can skye gnas bzhi dag tu //
translated: are sentient beings born from four birth processes.

original: mi dang dud 'gro rnam pa bzhi //
analyzed: mi dang dud 'gro rnam pa bzhi //
translated: Humans and animals have four types.

original: dmyal ba rnams dang lha rnams dang // srid pa bar ma rdzus te skye //
analyzed: dmyal ba rnams dang lha rnams dang // srid pa bar ma rdzus te skye //
translated: Hell beings, gods, and intermediate beings are apparitional beings.

original: yi dags mngal nas skye ba'ang yin //🔽'dir gang 'chi dang skye ba yi //
analyzed: yi dags mngal nas skye ba'ang yin // 'dir gang 'chi dang skye ba yi //
translated: Hungry ghosts are born from a womb.🔽Here, it is that which occurs

original: srid pa'i bar du 'byung ba'o //🔽bgrod pa'i yul du ma phyin phyir //
analyzed: srid pa'i bar du 'byung ba'o // bgrod pa'i yul du ma phyin phyir //
translated: between death and birth.🔽It is not that the intermediate existence occurs

original: srid pa bar ma byung ba min //
analyzed: srid pa bar ma byung ba min //
translated: because the destination has not been reached.

original: 'bru yi rgyun dang chos mthun phyir //
analyzed: 'bru yi rgyun dang chos mthun phyir //
translated: Because it is similar to a continuum of grain,

original: srid pa chad las byung ba min //
analyzed: srid pa chad las byung ba min //
translated: existence does not arise from annihilation.

original: gzugs brnyan ma grub phyir pa dang // mi 'dra'i phyir na dpe ma yin //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan ma grub phyir pa dang // mi 'dra'i phyir na dpe ma yin //
translated: Because a reflection is not established and because it is dissimilar, it is not an example.

original: gcig na lhan cig gnyis med phyir //
analyzed: gcig na lhan cig gnyis med phyir //
translated: If it were one, it would not be two because they are simultaneous.

original: rgyun min phyir gnyis las byung phyir //
analyzed: rgyun min phyir gnyis las byung phyir //
translated: Because it is not a continuum, because it arises from two,🔽and because it is stated in the oral instructions,

original: mgur nas gsungs phyir yod dri za //
analyzed: mgur nas gsungs phyir yod dri za //
translated: the gandharva exists.

original: lngar gsungs 'gro mdo las kyang grub //
analyzed: lngar gsungs 'gro mdo las kyang grub //
translated: This is also established by the sutra on going to another migration.

original: de ni 'phen pa gcig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: de ni 'phen pa gcig pa'i phyir //
translated: Because it is propelled by one,

original: sngon dus srid 'byung sha tshugs can //
analyzed: sngon dus srid 'byung sha tshugs can //
translated: it has the form that existed in the prior life.

original: de ni 'chi ba'i sngon rol te //
analyzed: de ni 'chi ba'i sngon rol te //
translated: This is prior to death

original: skye ba'i skad cig @7b phan chad do //
analyzed: skye ba'i skad cig @7b phan chad do //
translated: but after the moment of birth.

original: rigs mthun lha mig dag pas mthong //
analyzed: rigs mthun lha mig dag pas mthong //
translated: It is seen by the pure divine eye of one of similar type.

original: las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan //
analyzed: las kyi rdzu 'phrul shugs dang ldan //
translated: It possesses the power of magical emanation through karma.

original: dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan //
analyzed: dbang po kun tshang thogs med ldan //
translated: They are born in the desire realm, with all their faculties complete, without being defective,

original: mi zlog de ni dri za'o //🔽blo ni phyin ci log gyur pas //
analyzed: mi zlog de ni dri za'o // blo ni phyin ci log gyur pas //
translated: and they are not turned back by the guards.🔽They go to the place of their destination,

original: rtse dgas 'gro ba'i yul du 'gro //
analyzed: rtse dgas 'gro ba'i yul du 'gro //
translated: because their minds are perverted by desire.

original: dri dang gnas la mngon 'dod gzhan //
analyzed: dri dang gnas la mngon 'dod gzhan //
translated: Others desire smell and place.

original: dmyal ba yi ni spyi'u tshugs yin //
analyzed: dmyal ba yi ni spyi'u tshugs yin //
translated: Hell beings are inverted.

original: gcig ni shes bzhin du 'jug go //
analyzed: gcig ni shes bzhin du 'jug go //
translated: One enters consciously.

original: gzhan ni gnas pa yang gzhan ni //
analyzed: gzhan ni gnas pa yang gzhan ni //
translated: Another remains in the womb.🔽Another is born.

original: 'byung ba 'ang gzhan ni thams cad rmongs //
analyzed: 'byung ba 'ang gzhan ni thams cad rmongs //
translated: All are deluded.

original: sgo nga las skyes rtag tu'o //
analyzed: sgo nga las skyes rtag tu'o //
translated: Those born from eggs are always like this.

original: mngal du 'jug pa gsum dag ste //
analyzed: mngal du 'jug pa gsum dag ste //
translated: There are three kinds of entry into the womb.

original: 'khor los sgyur dang rang byung gnyis //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur dang rang byung gnyis //
translated: The two are the wheel-turning kings and the self-arisen ones.

original: las sam ye shes sam gnyis ka / rgya che'i phyir na go rims bzhin //
analyzed: las sam ye shes sam gnyis ka / rgya che'i phyir na go rims bzhin //
translated: Due to karma, wisdom, or both, in order,

original: bdag med phung po tsam nyid do //
analyzed: bdag med phung po tsam nyid do //
translated: the self is merely the aggregates.

original: nyon mongs las kyis mngon 'dus byas //
analyzed: nyon mongs las kyis mngon 'dus byas //
translated: It is manifestly created by affliction and karma.

original: srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis na //
analyzed: srid pa bar ma'i rgyun gyis na //
translated: By the continuum of the intermediate existence,

original: mar me bzhin du mngal du 'gro //
analyzed: mar me bzhin du mngal du 'gro //
translated: like a lamp, it goes to the womb.

original: ji ltar 'phangs bzhin rim gyis rgyun //
analyzed: ji ltar 'phangs bzhin rim gyis rgyun //
translated: In order, the continuum is projected.

original: skyes nas las dang nyon mongs kyis //
analyzed: skyes nas las dang nyon mongs kyis //
translated: After birth, by karma and affliction,

original: 'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'gro //
analyzed: 'jig rten pha rol dag tu 'gro //
translated: One goes to the next world.

original: srid pa'i 'khor lo thog ma med //🔽de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i //
analyzed: srid pa'i 'khor lo thog ma med // de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i //
translated: The wheel of existence has no beginning.🔽It is the twelve members,

original: yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum mo //
analyzed: yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum mo //
translated: With three sections, of dependent origination.🔽At the beginning and end are two members each,

original: sngon dang phyi mthar gnyis gnyis dang // bar du brgyad yongs rdzogs ldan la //
analyzed: sngon dang phyi mthar gnyis gnyis dang // bar du brgyad yongs rdzogs ldan la //
translated: And in the middle are the eight complete.

original: ma rig nyon mongs mngon gnas skabs //
analyzed: ma rig nyon mongs mngon gnas skabs //
translated: Ignorance is the state of affliction.

original: 'du byed dag ni sngon las kyi //
analyzed: 'du byed dag ni sngon las kyi //
translated: Formation is the karma of the past.

original: rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin //
analyzed: rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin //
translated: Consciousness is the aggregates at conception.

original: ming dang gzugs ni de phan chad //
analyzed: ming dang gzugs ni de phan chad //
translated: Name and form are from that point on.

original: skye mched drug dod tshun chad do //
analyzed: skye mched drug dod tshun chad do //
translated: The six sense powers are until the sense powers are complete.

original: de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad do //🔽reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyi //
analyzed: de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad do // reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyi //
translated: Contact is until the three meet.

original: rgyu shes nus pa tshun chad do //
analyzed: rgyu shes nus pa tshun chad do //
translated: Contact is the ability to know pleasure, pain, and so forth.

original: tshor 'khrig tshun chad sred pa ni //🔽longs spyod 'khrig pa chags can gyi //🔽nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams //
analyzed: tshor 'khrig tshun chad sred pa ni // longs spyod 'khrig pa chags can gyi // nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams //
translated: Feeling is until one is capable of sexual intercourse.🔽Craving is the desire for the enjoyments of sexual intercourse.🔽Clinging is the pursuit of enjoyments

original: thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'i //🔽de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i //
analyzed: thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'i // de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i //
translated: In order to obtain them.🔽Existence is the karma

original: las byed de ni srid pa yin //
analyzed: las byed de ni srid pa yin //
translated: That will produce the effect of that.

original: nying mtshams sbyor ba skye ba yin //
analyzed: nying mtshams sbyor ba skye ba yin //
translated: Linking is birth.

original: tshor ba'i bar ni rga shi yin //
analyzed: tshor ba'i bar ni rga shi yin //
translated: Up to feeling is aging and death.

original: 'di ni gnas skabs par 'dod lo //
analyzed: 'di ni gnas skabs par 'dod lo //
translated: This is asserted to be the temporal order.

original: gtso bo'i phyir na yan lag bsgrags //🔽sngon dang phyi mtha' bar dag la //
analyzed: gtso bo'i phyir na yan lag bsgrags // sngon dang phyi mtha' bar dag la //
translated: The limbs are proclaimed for the sake of the chief.🔽In order to reverse confusion

original: rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro //
analyzed: rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro //
translated: about the past, future, and the present.

original: nyon mongs gsum mo las gnyis so //
analyzed: nyon mongs gsum mo las gnyis so //
translated: Three are afflictions, two are actions,

original: gzhi bdun de bzhin 'bras bu yin //🔽gnyis kyi rgyu @8a * //
analyzed: gzhi bdun de bzhin 'bras bu yin // gnyis kyi rgyu @8a * //
translated: seven are bases, and so too are the results.

original: 'bras mdor bsdus pa //
analyzed: 'bras mdor bsdus pa //
translated: Two are causes and results in brief.

original: bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las //
analyzed: bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las //
translated: The middle is inferred from that.🔽From the afflictions arise the afflictions and action,

original: nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs dang // bya ba nyid do de las gzhi //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa las nyon mongs dang // bya ba nyid do de las gzhi //
translated: from that the bases,

original: de las gzhi dang nyon mongs skye //
analyzed: de las gzhi dang nyon mongs skye //
translated: from that the bases and the afflictions arise.

original: 'di ni srid pa'i yan lag lugs //
analyzed: 'di ni srid pa'i yan lag lugs //
translated: This is the system of the limbs of cyclic existence.

original: 'dir ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te //
analyzed: 'dir ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te //
translated: Here the elements are the causes,

original: byung ba 'bras bu yin par 'dod //
analyzed: byung ba 'bras bu yin par 'dod //
translated: the manifest are asserted to be the results.

original: rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs chos gzhan //
analyzed: rig pa'i mi mthun phyogs chos gzhan //
translated: The phenomena that are the opposite of knowledge

original: ma rig mi mdza' rdzun sogs bzhin //
analyzed: ma rig mi mdza' rdzun sogs bzhin //
translated: are like non-friends, lies, and so on.

original: kun sbyor sogs tshig phyir gal te //
analyzed: kun sbyor sogs tshig phyir gal te //
translated: If you say that because of the words “entanglements” and so on,

original: shes rab ngan pa'o min lta phyir //
analyzed: shes rab ngan pa'o min lta phyir //
translated: it is bad wisdom, it is not, because it is view.

original: lta ba de dang mtshungs ldan phyir //
analyzed: lta ba de dang mtshungs ldan phyir //
translated: Because it is concomitant with that view,

original: shes rab nyon mongs bstan phyir ro //
analyzed: shes rab nyon mongs bstan phyir ro //
translated: and because it is taught to be the wisdom of the afflicted.

original: ming ni gzugs can min phung po //
analyzed: ming ni gzugs can min phung po //
translated: Name is the non-material aggregates.

original: reg drug 'dus te byung ba yin //
analyzed: reg drug 'dus te byung ba yin //
translated: Contact arises from the union of the six.

original: lnga ni thogs pa'i reg pa yin //
analyzed: lnga ni thogs pa'i reg pa yin //
translated: Five are obstructive contact.

original: drug pa bla dags tshig ces bya //
analyzed: drug pa bla dags tshig ces bya //
translated: The sixth is called contact through designation.

original: rig dang ma rig dang gzhan reg / dri med nyon mongs can lhag ma //
analyzed: rig dang ma rig dang gzhan reg / dri med nyon mongs can lhag ma //
translated: Contact is either of knowing, not knowing, or other. The remainder are either stainless or afflicted.

original: gnod sems rjes su chags pa'i reg / bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum //
analyzed: gnod sems rjes su chags pa'i reg / bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum //
translated: Contact associated with malice and attachment are the three contacts that result in feeling pleasure, etc.

original: de las byung ba'i tshor ba drug / lnga ni lus kyi'o sems kyi gzhan //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i tshor ba drug / lnga ni lus kyi'o sems kyi gzhan //
translated: The six feelings that arise from those are five bodily and one mental.

original: de yid nye bar rgyu ba las //
analyzed: de yid nye bar rgyu ba las //
translated: From that, the mental applications arise.

original: rnam pa dag ni yang bco brgyad //
analyzed: rnam pa dag ni yang bco brgyad //
translated: They are of eighteen types.

original: 'dod na thams cad rang dmigs can //
analyzed: 'dod na thams cad rang dmigs can //
translated: In the desire realm, all have their own realm as their object.

original: spyod yul gzugs can bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: spyod yul gzugs can bcu gnyis so //
translated: The twelve of the form realm are the objects of the first two absorptions.

original: gong ma gsum gyi bsam gtan ni //
analyzed: gong ma gsum gyi bsam gtan ni //
translated: The three of the higher absorptions

original: gnyis na bcu gnyis 'dod 'gro rnams //
analyzed: gnyis na bcu gnyis 'dod 'gro rnams //
translated: are the objects of the twelve of the desire realm.🔽The eight of the formless realm

original: rang la dmigs brgyad gzugs med pa //
analyzed: rang la dmigs brgyad gzugs med pa //
translated: are the objects of their own level.

original: gnyis kyi'o bsam gtan gnyis na drug / drug gi 'dod pa'o rang ni bzhi'i //🔽gong ma gcig gi dmigs pa yin //
analyzed: gnyis kyi'o bsam gtan gnyis na drug / drug gi 'dod pa'o rang ni bzhi'i // gong ma gcig gi dmigs pa yin //
translated: The fourth absorption focuses on four.

original: gzugs med nye bar bsdogs na bzhi //
analyzed: gzugs med nye bar bsdogs na bzhi //
translated: The formless realm focuses on four.🔽The form realm focuses on one.

original: gzugs 'gro gong mar 'gro ba gcig / dngos gzhi na gcig rang yul can //
analyzed: gzugs 'gro gong mar 'gro ba gcig / dngos gzhi na gcig rang yul can //
translated: The formless realm focuses on one.🔽The actual bases focus on their own level.

analyzed: bco brgyad thams cad zag dang bcas //

original: bshad dang 'chad par 'gyur ba gzhan //

analyzed: klu bzhin rtsva bzhin ljon shing bzhin //

original: las ni shun bcas 'bras dang 'dra //
analyzed: las ni shun bcas 'bras dang 'dra //

original: de bzhin sman dang me tog bzhin //
analyzed: de bzhin sman dang me tog bzhin //

analyzed: gzhi ni bza' btung grub pa bzhin //

analyzed: srid pa bzhi po de dag las //

analyzed: skye ba'i srid pa nyon mongs can //

analyzed: gzhan rnam gsum po gzugs med gsum //

analyzed: 'gro ba zas kyis gnas pa yin //

original: kham gyi zas ni 'dod pa na //
analyzed: kham gyi zas ni 'dod pa na //

translated: The two are for the sake of projecting🔽and establishing another existence, respectively.🔽The two are for the sake of projecting

analyzed: 'og mi lhar 'gro mi skye rnams //🔽rim gyis 'chi na rkang pa dang // lte ba snying gar yid 'chi 'pho //

analyzed: 'phags dang mtshams med byed pa dag //
