original: yang dag log pa nyid du nges //
analyzed: yang dag log pa nyid du nges //
translated: are ascertained as being in the correct and inverted states.

original: de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi //
analyzed: de la snod kyi 'jig rten gyi //
translated: In this world, the abode of the vessel,

original: gnas par 'dod pa'i 'og dag gi //
analyzed: gnas par 'dod pa'i 'og dag gi //

analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rngams su ni //

analyzed: sa ya drug 'bum grangs med do // chu rngams 'bum phrag bcu gcig dang // stong phrag dag ni nyi shu'o //

analyzed: phyis ni rngams su 'bum phrag brgyad //

original: lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur //
analyzed: lhag ma dag ni gser du 'gyur //

analyzed: chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor gyi // thad kar 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang // stong phrag gsum dang brgya phrag ni //

analyzed: phyed dang lnga rnams kho na'o //

analyzed: khor yug tu ni sum 'gyur ro // de la lhun po gnya' shing 'dzin //

original: gshol mda' 'dzin dang seng ldeng can //
analyzed: gshol mda' 'dzin dang seng ldeng can //

analyzed: de bzhin blta na sdug ri dang // rta rna dang ni rnam 'dud dang // mu khyud 'dzin ri'o de nas ni //

original: gling rnams yin no de dag gi //
analyzed: gling rnams yin no de dag gi //
translated: Beyond are the continents

original: phyi rol na ni khor yug ste //
analyzed: phyi rol na ni khor yug ste //
translated: and the outer ring, Cakravāḍa.

original: bdun ni gser yin de lcags so //
analyzed: bdun ni gser yin de lcags so //

analyzed: lhun po rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin // chu yi nang du brgyad khri dag / nub bo de bzhin steng du yang //

original: dpag tshad dag ni brgyad khri'o //
analyzed: dpag tshad dag ni brgyad khri'o //

original: brgyad po 'phang du phyed phyed dbri //
analyzed: brgyad po 'phang du phyed phyed dbri //

original: de dag rngams su'ang 'phang dang mnyam //
analyzed: de dag rngams su'ang 'phang dang mnyam //

original: de dag bar bdun rol mtsho yin //
analyzed: de dag bar bdun rol mtsho yin //

original: dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o //
analyzed: dang po stong phrag brgyad cu'o //

original: de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin //🔽de yi ngos la @9a * //
analyzed: de ni nang gi rgya mtsho yin // de yi ngos la @9a * //

original: sum 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sum 'gyur ro //

original: rol mtsho gzhan ni phyed phyed do //
analyzed: rol mtsho gzhan ni phyed phyed do //

original: lhag ma phyi yi mtsho chen yin //🔽'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag ni //
analyzed: lhag ma phyi yi mtsho chen yin // 'bum phrag gsum dang stong phrag ni //
translated: The rest is the outer ocean.

original: nyi shu gnyis so de la ni //
analyzed: nyi shu gnyis so de la ni //
translated: It is 322,000 leagues.

original: 'dzam bu'i gling ste ngos gsum la //
analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling ste ngos gsum la //
translated: The three sides of Jambudvīpa🔽

original: stong phrag gnyis so shing rta'i dbyibs //
analyzed: stong phrag gnyis so shing rta'i dbyibs //
translated: The southern continent is three thousand yojanas on each of its three sides,🔽and has the shape of a cart.

original: gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi //
analyzed: gcig la dpag tshad phyed dang bzhi //
translated: One side is four and a half yojanas.

original: shar gyi lus 'phags zla kham 'dra //🔽ngos gsum 'di dang 'dra gcig la //
analyzed: shar gyi lus 'phags zla kham 'dra // ngos gsum 'di dang 'dra gcig la //
translated: Videha in the east is like a half moon.

original: dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o //
analyzed: dpag tshad sum brgya lnga bcu'o //
translated: Three sides are like that continent; one side is three hundred and fifty yojanas.

original: ba lang spyod gling zlum po ste //
analyzed: ba lang spyod gling zlum po ste //
translated: Godaniya is a circular continent

original: stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no //
analyzed: stong phrag phyed dang brgyad yin no //
translated: eight thousand five hundred yojanas in circumference.

original: de'i dbus stong phrag phyed dang gsum //
analyzed: de'i dbus stong phrag phyed dang gsum //
translated: Its center is five thousand yojanas.

original: sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhir mnyam//
analyzed: sgra mi snyan brgyad gru bzhir mnyam//
translated: Kurava in the north is square and even.

original: de yi bar gyi gling brgyad ni //🔽lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan //🔽sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni //
analyzed: de yi bar gyi gling brgyad ni // lus dang lus 'phags sgra mi snyan // sgra mi snyan gyi zla dang ni //
translated: The eight intermediate continents🔽are Deha, Videha, Kuru,

original: rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan //
analyzed: rnga yab dang ni rnga yab gzhan //
translated: Kaurava, Câmara, Apara-câmara,

original: g-yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro //🔽'di nas byang du ri nag po //🔽dgu 'das gangs ri'o de nas ni //
analyzed: g-yo ldan dang ni lam mchog 'gro // 'di nas byang du ri nag po // dgu 'das gangs ri'o de nas ni //
translated: Satha and Uttaramantrins.🔽To the north of Jambudvīpa,🔽beyond nine black mountain ranges is Himavat.

original: spos ngad ldang ba'i tshu rol na //
analyzed: spos ngad ldang ba'i tshu rol na //
translated: Beyond that, on the other side of the fragrant mountain

original: chu zheng lnga bcu yod pa'i mtsho //
analyzed: chu zheng lnga bcu yod pa'i mtsho //

original: 'di 'og stong phrag nyi shu na //
analyzed: 'di 'og stong phrag nyi shu na //

original: mnar med pa'o de tsam mo //
analyzed: mnar med pa'o de tsam mo //
translated: It is the same size.

original: de yi steng na dmyal ba bdun //
analyzed: de yi steng na dmyal ba bdun //
translated: Above it are the seven hells.🔽There are sixteen above all eight.

original: brgyad po kun las lhag bcu drug / de dag gi ni ngos bzhi na //
analyzed: brgyad po kun las lhag bcu drug / de dag gi ni ngos bzhi na //
translated: In the four directions of these are🔽the Hell of Burning Embers, the Hell of Putrid Corpses,

original: me ma mur dang ro myags dang // spu gri'i lam sogs chu bo yin //
analyzed: me ma mur dang ro myags dang // spu gri'i lam sogs chu bo yin //

original: chu bur can sogs grang brgyad gzhan //
analyzed: chu bur can sogs grang brgyad gzhan //
translated: The eight cold hells are the Blistering Hell and so on.

original: nyi zla lhun po'i phyed na'o //
analyzed: nyi zla lhun po'i phyed na'o //
translated: The sun and moon are halfway up Mount Meru.

original: dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig dang bcas //
analyzed: dpag tshad lnga bcu gcig dang bcas //
translated: They are fifty one yojanas.🔽Midnight, sunset,

original: nam phyed nyi ma nub pa dang // nyi ma phyed dang 'char dus gcig //
analyzed: nam phyed nyi ma nub pa dang // nyi ma phyed dang 'char dus gcig //
translated: noon, and sunrise are simultaneous.

original: dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa yi //
analyzed: dbyar gyi zla ba gnyis pa yi //
translated: In the second month of summer

original: tha ma'i tshes dgu nas mtshan ring //
analyzed: tha ma'i tshes dgu nas mtshan ring //

original: dgun rnams kyi ni bzhi pa la //
analyzed: dgun rnams kyi ni bzhi pa la //

analyzed: thung ngur 'gyur ro nyin mo bzlog / nyin mtshan ring ba thang cig go //

original: nyi ma lho byang 'gro tshe'o //
analyzed: nyi ma lho byang 'gro tshe'o //

original: nyi ma dang ni nye ba las //
analyzed: nyi ma dang ni nye ba las //

analyzed: rang gi grib mas 'grib par snang //

analyzed: 'di la bang rim bzhi yod de //

analyzed: bar gyi thag ni stong phrag bcu //

analyzed: stong phrag dag ni bcu drug dang // brgyad dang bzhi dang gnyis 'phags so //

analyzed: de la lag na gzhong thogs dang // phreng thogs dang ni rtag myos dang // rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha rnams gnas //

analyzed: ri ni bdun po dag la yang //

original: gling bzhi pa dang nyi zla dang // ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang // tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni //
analyzed: gling bzhi pa dang nyi zla dang // ri rab dang ni 'dod lha dang // tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong la ni //
translated: Meru, the gods of the realm of desire and the world of Brahma

original: stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod //
analyzed: stong ni spyi phud yin par 'dod //
translated: constitute one chiliocosm.

analyzed: de stong la ni stong gnyis pa // bar ma'i 'jig rten khams yin no //

original: de stong la ni stong gsum mo //
analyzed: de stong la ni stong gsum mo //
translated: A thousand of these are a trichiliocosm.

original: mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin //
analyzed: mnyam du 'jig cing 'byung ba yin //
translated: They are formed and destroyed together.

original: 'dzam bu gling pa rnams kyi tshad //
analyzed: 'dzam bu gling pa rnams kyi tshad //
translated: The human life span in Jambudvipa

original: khru bzhi pa dang phyed dang bzhi //
analyzed: khru bzhi pa dang phyed dang bzhi //
translated: is four or twenty-five years.

original: shar dang ba lang spyod dang ni //
analyzed: shar dang ba lang spyod dang ni //
translated: In the east and in the west,

original: byang zhes bya ba nyis 'gyur bskyed //
analyzed: byang zhes bya ba nyis 'gyur bskyed //
translated: it is doubled each time.

original: 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus //
analyzed: 'dod dang ldan pa'i lha yi lus //
translated: The bodies of the gods of the realm of desire

original: bzhi cha nas ni rgyang grags dag //
analyzed: bzhi cha nas ni rgyang grags dag //
translated: are, at first, a quarter of a krośa and

original: phyed dang gnyis kyi bar du bskyed //
analyzed: phyed dang gnyis kyi bar du bskyed //
translated: then double each time up to a krośa and a half.

original: gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed //
analyzed: gzugs can dang po dpag tshad phyed //
translated: The first form realm gods are half a yojana.

original: de yi gong ma phyed phyed bskyed //
analyzed: de yi gong ma phyed phyed bskyed //
translated: The others increase by half.

original: 'od chung rnams kyi ltag yan chad //
analyzed: 'od chung rnams kyi ltag yan chad //
translated: Above the gods of Lesser Splendor,

original: lus ni nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur te //
analyzed: lus ni nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur te //
translated: the bodies double in size🔽except for the gods beyond the cloudless realm,

original: sprin med dpag tshad gsum dor ro //
analyzed: sprin med dpag tshad gsum dor ro //
translated: whose bodies are three yojanas less.

original: sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste //
analyzed: sgra mi snyan na tshe stong ste //
translated: In Kuru, life is one thousand years;

original: gnyis na phyed phyed spangs pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis na phyed phyed spangs pa'o //
translated: in the two continents, it diminishes by half.

original: 'di na ma nges tha mar ni //🔽lo bcu dang po dpag tu med //
analyzed: 'di na ma nges tha mar ni // lo bcu dang po dpag tu med //
translated: Here, it is not determined:🔽at the end, it is ten years; at the beginning, it isincalculable.

original: mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu la //
translated: Fifty human years🔽is one day

original: 'dod pa dag gi lha rnams @10a * //
analyzed: 'dod pa dag gi lha rnams @10a * //
translated: for the lowest gods of the realm of desire.

original: las // 'og ma dag gi nyin zhag gcig / des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o //
analyzed: las // 'og ma dag gi nyin zhag gcig / des na tshe lo lnga brgya'o //
translated: Their lifespan is five hundred years.

original: gong ma gnyis ka nyis 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gong ma gnyis ka nyis 'gyur ro //
translated: For the two higher realms, double the lifespans and the days.

original: gzugs can nyin mtshan med tshe ni //
analyzed: gzugs can nyin mtshan med tshe ni //
translated: The gods of the realm of form have no days and nights;

original: rang lus gzhal ba'i bskal pa yis //🔽gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni //
analyzed: rang lus gzhal ba'i bskal pa yis // gzugs med bskal pa stong phrag ni //
translated: their lifespans are calculated in eons the length of which is determined by the size of their bodies.

original: nyi shu lhag pas lhag pa yin ;
analyzed: nyi shu lhag pas lhag pa yin ;
translated: The gods of the formless realm have lifespans of twenty thousand eons.

original: /'od chung nas bzung bskal chen te //
analyzed: /'od chung nas bzung bskal chen te //
translated: The gods of the realm of desire have lifespans of one great eon.

original: de yi 'og ma phyed yin no //
analyzed: de yi 'og ma phyed yin no //
translated: The gods of the realm of form have lifespans of half a great eon.

original: yang sos la sogs drug rim bzhin //
analyzed: yang sos la sogs drug rim bzhin //
translated: The six hells, beginning with Saṃjīva,

original: 'dod lha'i tshe dang nyin zhag mnyam //🔽des na de dag rnams kyi tshe //
analyzed: 'dod lha'i tshe dang nyin zhag mnyam // des na de dag rnams kyi tshe //
translated: have lifespans equal to those of the desire gods.

original: 'dod pa'i lha dang 'dra ba yin //🔽rab tu tsha phyed mnar med ni //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i lha dang 'dra ba yin // rab tu tsha phyed mnar med ni //
translated: Therefore, their lifespans are the same as those of the desire gods.🔽The lifespan in Avīci is half an intermediate eon.

original: bar gyi bskal pa'o dud 'gro rnams //
analyzed: bar gyi bskal pa'o dud 'gro rnams //
translated: The animals have no fixed lifespan.

original: mchog ring bskal pa'o yi dags rnams //
analyzed: mchog ring bskal pa'o yi dags rnams //
translated: The longest life is one eon.🔽

original: zla ba nyin zhag gi lnga brgya //🔽til sbyangs nang nas lo brgya zhing //
analyzed: zla ba nyin zhag gi lnga brgya // til sbyangs nang nas lo brgya zhing //
translated: The life of the hungry ghosts is five hundred years.🔽In the Cold Sore Hell, a life is the time it takes to exhaust🔽the grain in a jar the size of a bushel,🔽with a hole the size of a sesame seed,

original: til gcig phyung bas zad gyur pa //🔽chu bur can gyi tshe yin te //
analyzed: til gcig phyung bas zad gyur pa // chu bur can gyi tshe yin te //
translated: emptied once every hundred years of a sesame seed.

original: gzhan gyi tshe ni nyi shus bsgyur //
analyzed: gzhan gyi tshe ni nyi shus bsgyur //
translated: The life of the others is twenty times longer than the previous.

original: sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par 'chi ;
analyzed: sgra mi snyan ma gtogs par 'chi ;
translated: Except for Unpleasant Sound.🔽The smallest unit of matter is a particle,🔽the smallest unit of time is an instant.🔽The smallest unit of matter is a particle,

analyzed: / gzugs ming dus mtha' rdul yig dang // skad cig phra rab rdul dang ni //

analyzed: rdul phran dang ni de bzhin du // lcags chu ri bong lug dang glang //
translated: The smallest unit of matter is a particle,🔽the smallest unit of time is an instant.🔽The smallest unit of matter is a particle,🔽the smallest unit of time is an instant.

analyzed: nyi zer rdul dang sro ma dang // de las byung dang de bzhin du //
translated: The smallest unit of matter is a particle,

original: sor tshigs zhes bya gong bdun bsgyur //🔽sor mo nyi shu bzhi la khru //🔽khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo /
analyzed: sor tshigs zhes bya gong bdun bsgyur // sor mo nyi shu bzhi la khru // khru bzhi la ni gzhu gang ngo /

analyzed: de dag lnga brgya rnams la ni //

analyzed: rgyang grags de la dgon par 'dod //

analyzed: de brgyad dpag tshad ces bya'o //

original: skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la //
analyzed: skad cig ma brgya nyi shu la //
translated: the smallest unit of time is an instant.

original: de yi skad cig de dag kyang //
analyzed: de yi skad cig de dag kyang //
translated: Sixty of those are one instant.

original: drug cu la ni thang cig go //🔽yud tsam nyin zhag zla gsum ni //
analyzed: drug cu la ni thang cig go // yud tsam nyin zhag zla gsum ni //
translated: Sixty instants are one second.🔽Thirty seconds are one minute.🔽Thirty minutes are one hour.

original: gong nas gong du sum cu 'gyur //🔽zhag mi thub dang bcas pa yi //
analyzed: gong nas gong du sum cu 'gyur // zhag mi thub dang bcas pa yi //
translated: Thirty hours are one day and night.

original: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig //
analyzed: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig //
translated: Twelve months, including the intercalary month, are one year.

original: bskal pa rnam pa mang bshad pa //🔽'jig pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi //
analyzed: bskal pa rnam pa mang bshad pa // 'jig pa'i bskal pa dmyal ba yi //
translated: Many types of eons are explained.🔽The eon of destruction is from the nonexistence of the hells

original: srid pa med nas snod zad pa //🔽'chags pa dang po'i rlung nas ni //🔽dmyal ba'i srid pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: srid pa med nas snod zad pa // 'chags pa dang po'i rlung nas ni // dmyal ba'i srid pa'i bar du'o //
translated: until the destruction of the environment.🔽The eon of formation is from the wind up to the existence of the hells.🔽The eon of creation is from the wind up to the existence of the hells.

original: bar gyi bskal pa dpag med nas //🔽tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: bar gyi bskal pa dpag med nas // tshe lo bcu pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The eon of creation is from the wind up to the existence of the hells.

analyzed: de nas yar skye mar 'bri ba'i // bskal pa gzhan ni bco brgyad dang // yar skye ba ni gcig yin te //
translated: The eon of creation is from the wind up to the existence of the hells.🔽The eon of creation is from the wind up to the existence of the hells.

analyzed: de dag tshe ni brgyad khri'i bar // de ltar 'jig rten chags pa 'di // bar gyi @10b bskal pa nyi shur gnas //

original: 'chags pa dang ni 'jig pa dang // zhig nas 'dug pa dag mnyam mo //
analyzed: 'chags pa dang ni 'jig pa dang // zhig nas 'dug pa dag mnyam mo //
translated: The eon of creation is from the wind up to the existence of the hells.🔽The eon of creation is from the wind up

original: de dag brgyad cu la bskal chen //
analyzed: de dag brgyad cu la bskal chen //
translated: Eighty of those make one great eon.

original: de grangs med gsum la sangs rgyas //🔽'byung ngo mar ni 'grib pa yi //
analyzed: de grangs med gsum la sangs rgyas // 'byung ngo mar ni 'grib pa yi //
translated: A buddha arises after three measureless eons.🔽The world remains for twenty intermediate eons

original: brgya yi bar la de dag 'byung //
analyzed: brgya yi bar la de dag 'byung //
translated: after the decrease of lifespan to one hundred years.

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams gnyis ka la //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams gnyis ka la //
translated: Pratyekabuddhas arise in both

original: bse ru bskal pa brgya yi rgyus //
analyzed: bse ru bskal pa brgya yi rgyus //
translated: ages. Rhinoceros like ones arise due to the cause of one hundred eons.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba ni //
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba 'byung ba ni //
translated: Regarding the arising of cakravartins,

original: stong phrag brgyad cu las mi 'phyi //
analyzed: stong phrag brgyad cu las mi 'phyi //
translated: they do not arise when lifespan is less than eight thousand years.

original: gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo can //
analyzed: gser dngul zangs lcags 'khor lo can //
translated: Those with wheels of gold, silver, copper and iron

original: de dag gling gcig gling gnyis dang // gsum dang bzhi las mas rim bzhin //
analyzed: de dag gling gcig gling gnyis dang // gsum dang bzhi las mas rim bzhin //
translated: rule one, two, three or four continents respectively.

original: lhan cig gnyis min sangs rgyas bzhin //
analyzed: lhan cig gnyis min sangs rgyas bzhin //
translated: Two do not arise simultaneously, like two buddhas.

original: phas bsu rang 'gro g-yul bshams dang // mtshon brtsams pas rgyal gnod pa med //
analyzed: phas bsu rang 'gro g-yul bshams dang // mtshon brtsams pas rgyal gnod pa med //
translated: They are victorious without harm through being met by the enemy, going themselves, arranging battle and beginning with weapons.

original: thub mtshan yul na gnas pa dang // gsal la rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin //
analyzed: thub mtshan yul na gnas pa dang // gsal la rdzogs pas 'phags pa yin //
translated: They are superior due to being able to remain in the country, being clear and complete, like the marks of a sage.

original: sngar byung sems can gzugs can bzhin //🔽de nas rim gyis ro la chags//
analyzed: sngar byung sems can gzugs can bzhin // de nas rim gyis ro la chags//
translated: They are like the sentient beings of the form realm that arose previously.🔽Then gradually attachment to taste arose.

original: le los sog 'jog byas nas ni //
analyzed: le los sog 'jog byas nas ni //
translated: Due to laziness, they stored grain.

original: 'dzin bcas rnams kyis zhing dpon bstabs //
analyzed: 'dzin bcas rnams kyis zhing dpon bstabs //
translated: The lords of the fields, the grahas, are propitiated by those who are attached.

original: de nas las kyi lam lhag pas //
analyzed: de nas las kyi lam lhag pas //
translated: Then, because of the predominance of the path of action,

original: tshe thung lo ni bcu yin no //🔽bskal pa mtshon dang nad dang ni //
analyzed: tshe thung lo ni bcu yin no // bskal pa mtshon dang nad dang ni //
translated: life decreases to a length of ten years.

original: mu ge dag gis tshar phyin to //🔽zhag rnams dang ni zla ba dang // lo bdun dag tu go rims bzhin //
analyzed: mu ge dag gis tshar phyin to // zhag rnams dang ni zla ba dang // lo bdun dag tu go rims bzhin //
translated: The eon is terminated by three destructions:

original: me dang chu dang rlung dag gis //🔽'jig pa dag ni yang gsum yin //
analyzed: me dang chu dang rlung dag gis // 'jig pa dag ni yang gsum yin //
translated: by fire, water, and wind.

original: bsam gtan gnyis sogs gsum po ni //
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis sogs gsum po ni //
translated: The three destructions of the second meditation and above

original: de dag gi rtse go rims bzhin //🔽de yi skyon dang chos mthun phyir //🔽bzhi pa na med mi g-yo'i phyir //
analyzed: de dag gi rtse go rims bzhin // de yi skyon dang chos mthun phyir // bzhi pa na med mi g-yo'i phyir //
translated: are, respectively, the fault of fire, water, and wind.🔽The fourth is not subject to destruction, because it is free from outflows.

original: mi rtag de yi gzhal med khang //
analyzed: mi rtag de yi gzhal med khang //
translated: The palaces of the gods of the fourth meditation,🔽together with the sentient beings who inhabit them,

original: sems can bcas te 'byung 'jig phyir //
analyzed: sems can bcas te 'byung 'jig phyir //
translated: are created and perish with the sentient beings.🔽Seven by fire, one by water;

original: me yis bdun no chu yis gcig / de ltar chu bdun thal nas kyang //
analyzed: me yis bdun no chu yis gcig / de ltar chu bdun thal nas kyang //
translated: when seven destructions by fire have thus taken place,🔽then there is one destruction by water;🔽this is repeated seven times,

original: me yis bdun no de nas ni //
analyzed: me yis bdun no de nas ni //
translated: then there are seven destructions by fire again,

original: mjug tu rlung gis 'jig pa yin //🔽chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las //
analyzed: mjug tu rlung gis 'jig pa yin //🔽chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las //
translated: followed by one destruction by wind.🔽The seven destructions by fire are followed by one destruction by water.🔽This is repeated seven times, then there are seven destructions by fire again, followed by one destruction by wind.

original: 'jig rten bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas gsum pa'o /🔽// / las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes //
analyzed: 'jig rten bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas gsum pa'o / // / las las 'jig rten sna tshogs skyes //
translated: Chapter Three: The Presentation of the World🔽The world arises from karma.

original: de ni sems pa dang des byas //
analyzed: de ni sems pa dang des byas //
translated: Karma is intention and that which is produced by intention.

original: sems pa yid kyi las yin no //
analyzed: sems pa yid kyi las yin no //
translated: Intention is mental karma.

original: des bskyed lus dang ngag gi las //
analyzed: des bskyed lus dang ngag gi las //
translated: Karma that is intention produces the karma of body and speech.

original: de dag rnam rig rnam rig min //
analyzed: de dag rnam rig rnam rig min //
translated: They are both perceptible and imperceptible.

original: lus rnam rig byed dbyibs su 'dod //🔽'gro min gang phyir 'dus @11a * //
analyzed: lus rnam rig byed dbyibs su 'dod // 'gro min gang phyir 'dus @11a * //
translated: The body’s perceptible form is asserted to be shape.

original: byas ni // skad cig ma yin 'jig phyir ro //
analyzed: byas ni // skad cig ma yin 'jig phyir ro //
translated: It is not a path because the conditioned is momentary and disintegrates.

original: rgyu med pa las 'ga' mi 'byung //
analyzed: rgyu med pa las 'ga' mi 'byung //
translated: Nothing arises without a cause.

original: rgyu yang 'jig pa por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rgyu yang 'jig pa por 'gyur ro //
translated: The cause would become the destroyer.

original: gnyis gzung 'gyur te rdul la med //
analyzed: gnyis gzung 'gyur te rdul la med //
translated: Two would be grasped, but there is no atom.

original: ngag rnams rig byed ni ngag sgra //
analyzed: ngag rnams rig byed ni ngag sgra //
translated: Speech is the sound of speech.

original: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang // 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs phyir //
analyzed: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang // 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs phyir //
translated: The three types of uncontaminated form are said to be derived from the four uncontaminated name aggregates.

original: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig //
analyzed: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig //
translated: Uncontaminated states of the desire realm arise in a single moment.

original: phyin chad 'das pa'i 'byung las skye //
analyzed: phyin chad 'das pa'i 'byung las skye //
translated: After that, they arise from past primary elements.

original: zag bcas lus dang ngag gi las //
analyzed: zag bcas lus dang ngag gi las //
translated: The contaminated actions of body and speech

original: rang gi 'byung ba dag rgyur byas //
analyzed: rang gi 'byung ba dag rgyur byas //
translated: are produced from their own primary elements.

original: zag med gang du skyes pa'i yin //🔽rnam rig byed min ma zin dang // rgyu mthun las byung sems can ston //
analyzed: zag med gang du skyes pa'i yin // rnam rig byed min ma zin dang // rgyu mthun las byung sems can ston //
translated: They are the uncontaminated states.

original: rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skye //
analyzed: rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skye //
translated: Nonindicative form that is not concomitant with the mind arises from the elements that are the cause of similar type and from the elements that are the cause of enhancement.🔽Nonindicative form that is concomitant with the mind arises from the elements that are the cause of similar type and from the elements that are the cause of enhancement.

original: ting 'dzin skyes 'byung ma zin dang // rgyas byung tha dad min las skyes //
analyzed: ting 'dzin skyes 'byung ma zin dang // rgyas byung tha dad min las skyes //
translated: Nonindicative form derived from concentration arises from the elements that are the cause of similar type and from the elements that are the cause of enhancement.

original: rnam rig min lung bstan min med //
analyzed: rnam rig min lung bstan min med //
translated: Nonindicative form is not declared to be either indicative or nonindicative.

original: gzhan ni rnam gsum mi dge ni //🔽'dod na'o gzugs na'ang rnam rig min //
analyzed: gzhan ni rnam gsum mi dge ni // 'dod na'o gzugs na'ang rnam rig min //
translated: Other nonindicative form is of three types.🔽Nonvirtue exists in the desire realm.🔽Nonindicative form exists in the form realm.

original: rnam rig dpyod dang bcas dag na //
analyzed: rnam rig dpyod dang bcas dag na //
translated: In the desire realm, nonindicative form is concomitant with investigation and analysis.

original: 'dod pa na yang bsgribs pa med //
analyzed: 'dod pa na yang bsgribs pa med //
translated: In the desire realm, unobscured neutral states exist.

original: gang phyir kun slong med thar pa //
analyzed: gang phyir kun slong med thar pa //
translated: Because there is no motivation for liberation,

original: dam pa'i don du dge rtsa ba //
analyzed: dam pa'i don du dge rtsa ba //
translated: the roots of virtue are ultimate.

original: ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis //
analyzed: ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis //
translated: Those who possess shame and embarrassment

original: de dag dang ldan mtshungs ldan gyis //
analyzed: de dag dang ldan mtshungs ldan gyis //
translated: are concomitant with virtue.

original: bya ba la sogs kun slong bas //🔽bzlog pa mi dge don dam par//
analyzed: bya ba la sogs kun slong bas // bzlog pa mi dge don dam par//
translated: Motivation is the cause of all actions and so on.🔽The opposite of that is nonvirtue.

original: lung ma bstan pa bstan pa dag //
analyzed: lung ma bstan pa bstan pa dag //
translated: The meaning of ultimate is taught.🔽Motivation is twofold:

original: kun slong rnam gnyis rgyu dang ni //🔽de yi dus kyi slong zhes bya //
analyzed: kun slong rnam gnyis rgyu dang ni //🔽de yi dus kyi slong zhes bya //
translated: the cause and the motivation at the time of the action.

original: gnyis las dang po rab 'jug byed //
analyzed: gnyis las dang po rab 'jug byed //
translated: The first is that which instigates.

original: gnyis pa rjes su 'jug byed yin //
analyzed: gnyis pa rjes su 'jug byed yin //
translated: The second is that which accompanies.

original: mthong bas spang bya'i rnam shes ni //
analyzed: mthong bas spang bya'i rnam shes ni //
translated: The consciousness to be abandoned by the path of seeing

original: rab tu 'jug byed yin yid ni //
analyzed: rab tu 'jug byed yin yid ni //
translated: is that which instigates.

original: bsgom pas spang bya gnyis ka yin //
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bya gnyis ka yin //
translated: That to be abandoned by the path of meditation is both.

original: lnga ni rjes su 'jug byed yin //
analyzed: lnga ni rjes su 'jug byed yin //
translated: The five are that which accompanies.

original: rab tu 'jug byed dge sogs las //
analyzed: rab tu 'jug byed dge sogs las //
translated: That which instigates is virtuous and so on.

original: rjes 'jug byed kyang rnam gsum 'gyur //
analyzed: rjes 'jug byed kyang rnam gsum 'gyur //
translated: That which accompanies is also threefold.

original: thub pa'i 'dra ba'am de dge ba //
analyzed: thub pa'i 'dra ba'am de dge ba //
translated: It is similar to the Muni or it is virtuous.

original: rnam smin las skyes gnyis ka min //
analyzed: rnam smin las skyes gnyis ka min //
translated: It is not both, since it arises from karmic maturation.

original: rnam rig min rnam gsum shes bya //
analyzed: rnam rig min rnam gsum shes bya //
translated: Nonindicative form should be understood as threefold.

original: sdom dang sdom pa min dang gzhan //
analyzed: sdom dang sdom pa min dang gzhan //
translated: It is vows, negative commitments and other than those.

original: sdom pa so sor thar zhes bya //
analyzed: sdom pa so sor thar zhes bya //
translated: Vows are called pratimokṣa.

original: de bzhin zag med bsam gtan skyes //
analyzed: de bzhin zag med bsam gtan skyes //
translated: So too, it is the uncontaminated absorption vows.

original: so sor thar zhes bya rnam brgyad //
analyzed: so sor thar zhes bya rnam brgyad //
translated: Pratimokṣa is said to be eightfold.

original: rdzas su rnam pa bzhi yin no //
analyzed: rdzas su rnam pa bzhi yin no //
translated: It is fourfold in substance.

original: mtshan las ming ni 'pho ba'i phyir //
analyzed: mtshan las ming ni 'pho ba'i phyir //
translated: The name changes due to the signs.

original: tha dad de dag 'gal ba med //
analyzed: tha dad de dag 'gal ba med //
translated: They are distinct but not contradictory.

original: spang bya lnga brgyad bcu dang ni //
analyzed: spang bya lnga brgyad bcu dang ni //
translated: It is taken from abandoning five, eight, ten

original: thams cad spong @11b ba mnos pa las //
analyzed: thams cad spong @11b ba mnos pa las //
translated: and all objects to be abandoned.

original: dge bsnyen dang ni bsnyen gnas dang // dge tshul ched dang dge slong nyid //
analyzed: dge bsnyen dang ni bsnyen gnas dang // dge tshul ched dang dge slong nyid //
translated: The vows of the upāsaka, upavāsastha, śramaṇera, and bhikṣu,

original: tshul khrims dang ni legs spyad dang // las dang sdom pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang ni legs spyad dang // las dang sdom pa zhes bya'o //
translated: are called morality, good conduct, action, and restraint.

original: dang po'i rnam rig rnam rig min //
analyzed: dang po'i rnam rig rnam rig min //
translated: The first is both informative and non-informative.

original: so sor thar dang bya ba'i lam //
analyzed: so sor thar dang bya ba'i lam //
translated: The path of action is the prātimokṣa.

original: so sor thar dang ldan pa brgyad /
analyzed: so sor thar dang ldan pa brgyad /
translated: The prātimokṣa is possessed by eight.

original: bsam gtan skyes dang de ldan pa //
analyzed: bsam gtan skyes dang de ldan pa //
translated: Those born in the dhyānas possess it.

original: zag med 'phags pa'i sems can dang // tha ma gnyis ni sems rjes 'brang //
analyzed: zag med 'phags pa'i sems can dang // tha ma gnyis ni sems rjes 'brang //
translated: The last two are concomitant with mind.

original: bar chad med lam skyes de gnyis //
analyzed: bar chad med lam skyes de gnyis //
translated: Those two arise on the uninterrupted path.

original: mi lcogs med la spong zhes bya //🔽shes bzhin dang ni dran dag gnyis //
analyzed: mi lcogs med la spong zhes bya // shes bzhin dang ni dran dag gnyis //
translated: They are called abandonment in the unrestricted.🔽Alertness and purity of mindfulness

original: yid dang dbang po'i sdom pa yin //
analyzed: yid dang dbang po'i sdom pa yin //
translated: are the restraint of the mind and the sense faculties.

original: so sor thar gnas ji srid du //
analyzed: so sor thar gnas ji srid du //
translated: As long as one remains in the prātimokṣa,

original: ma btang bar dag da ltar gyi //🔽rnam rig min ldan skad cig ma //
analyzed: ma btang bar dag da ltar gyi // rnam rig min ldan skad cig ma //
translated: one possesses present non-informative action.🔽The first moment and after, one possesses past

original: dang po phyin chad 'das pa dang // sdom min gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra //
analyzed: dang po phyin chad 'das pa dang // sdom min gnas pa'ang de dang 'dra //
translated: non-informative action. The same for those who possess negative commitments.

original: bsam gtan sdom dang ldan pa ni //
analyzed: bsam gtan sdom dang ldan pa ni //
translated: Those who possess the restraint of the dhyānas

original: rtag tu 'das dang ma 'ongs dang // 'phags ni dang po 'das dang min ;🔽/ mnyam gzhag 'phags lam gnas de gnyis //
analyzed: rtag tu 'das dang ma 'ongs dang // 'phags ni dang po 'das dang min ; / mnyam gzhag 'phags lam gnas de gnyis //
translated: One who is an ārya but not in meditative equipoise possesses past and future states.

original: da ltar dang ldan bar gnas la //
analyzed: da ltar dang ldan bar gnas la //
translated: One who is in meditative equipoise on the ārya path possesses present states.

original: yod na dang po bar gyi dang // phyin chad dus ni gnyis dang ngo //🔽sdom min gnas pa dge ba dang // sdom la gnas pa mi dge ba'i //
analyzed: yod na dang po bar gyi dang // phyin chad dus ni gnyis dang ngo // sdom min gnas pa dge ba dang // sdom la gnas pa mi dge ba'i //
translated: If one possesses present states, one possesses two times.🔽One who possesses negative commitments possesses virtuous nonindicative form.

original: rnam rig min ldan ji srid du //
analyzed: rnam rig min ldan ji srid du //
translated: One who possesses vows possesses nonvirtuous nonindicative form.🔽As long as one possesses

original: rab dang nyon mongs shugs ldan par //
analyzed: rab dang nyon mongs shugs ldan par //
translated: virtuous or afflicted powerful states.

original: rnam rig byed ni thams cad la //
analyzed: rnam rig byed ni thams cad la //
translated: One who is engaged in indicative form

original: byed pa dag la da ltar ldan //
analyzed: byed pa dag la da ltar ldan //
translated: possesses present nonindicative form.

original: ma btang bar du skad cig ma //
analyzed: ma btang bar du skad cig ma //
translated: Until relinquished, one possesses past nonindicative form

original: phyin chad 'das ldan ma 'ongs med //
analyzed: phyin chad 'das ldan ma 'ongs med //
translated: in the future, but not past nonindicative form.

original: bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa //
analyzed: bsgribs pa dang ni ma bsgribs pa //
translated: One who possesses obscured or unobscured neutral nonindicative form

original: 'das pa dag dang ldan pa'ang med //
analyzed: 'das pa dag dang ldan pa'ang med //
translated: does not possess past nonindicative form.🔽Negative commitments, misconduct,

original: sdom pa min dang nyes spyad dang // 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las de'i lam //
analyzed: sdom pa min dang nyes spyad dang // 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las de'i lam //
translated: and immorality are paths of nonvirtue.

original: bar ma dor gnas sems zhan pas //
analyzed: bar ma dor gnas sems zhan pas //
translated: If one engages in them with a weak mind,

original: byed na rnam rig nyid dang ldan //
analyzed: byed na rnam rig nyid dang ldan //
translated: one possesses only present nonindicative form.

original: rnam rig btang dang ma skyes pa'i //🔽'phags pa'i gang zag rnam rig min //🔽bsam gtan las skyes bsam gtan gyi //
analyzed: rnam rig btang dang ma skyes pa'i // 'phags pa'i gang zag rnam rig min // bsam gtan las skyes bsam gtan gyi //
translated: The nonindicative form of the ārya is not derived from meditation.

original: sa nyid kyis 'thob zag med ni //
analyzed: sa nyid kyis 'thob zag med ni //
translated: The nonindicative form of the āryas is obtained by the level of absorption itself.

original: 'phags des so sor thar zhes pa //
analyzed: 'phags des so sor thar zhes pa //
translated: The pure nonindicative form is obtained by the ārya alone.

original: gzhan gyi rnam rig byed stsogs kyis //🔽ji srid 'tsho dang nyin zhag tu //
analyzed: gzhan gyi rnam rig byed stsogs kyis // ji srid 'tsho dang nyin zhag tu //
translated: The nonindicative form of others is obtained by the indicative form of others.

original: sdom pa yang dag blang bar bya //
analyzed: sdom pa yang dag blang bar bya //
translated: Vows are properly taken for as long as one lives or for a day and night.

original: nyin zhag pa yi sdom min med //
analyzed: nyin zhag pa yi sdom min med //
translated: Nonvows do not exist for a day and night.

original: de de ltar nod med ces grag / dma' bar 'dug smras bzlas pa yis //
analyzed: de de ltar nod med ces grag / dma' bar 'dug smras bzlas pa yis //
translated: It is well known that one does not take them in that way.🔽One should not ornament oneself

original: mi brgyan nam ni @12a * //
analyzed: mi brgyan nam ni @12a * //
translated: or sleep

original: nang par du //
analyzed: nang par du //
translated: in the morning.

original: bsnyen gnas yan lag tshang bar ni //
analyzed: bsnyen gnas yan lag tshang bar ni //
translated: The complete limbs of one day vows

original: nang par gzhan las nod par bya //🔽tshul khrims yan lag bag yod pa'i //
analyzed: nang par gzhan las nod par bya // tshul khrims yan lag bag yod pa'i //
translated: should be taken from another in the morning.🔽The limbs of ethics, the limbs of heedfulness,

original: yan lag brtul zhugs yan lag ste //
analyzed: yan lag brtul zhugs yan lag ste //
translated: the limbs of ascetic practices,

original: bzhi gcig de bzhin gsum rim bzhin //🔽de yis dran nyams dregs par 'gyur //
analyzed: bzhi gcig de bzhin gsum rim bzhin // de yis dran nyams dregs par 'gyur //
translated: four, one, and likewise three,🔽in order, are the limbs of the vows of individual liberation.

original: gzhan la'ang bsnyen gnas yod mod kyi //
analyzed: gzhan la'ang bsnyen gnas yod mod kyi //
translated: Even though others have one day vows,

original: skyabs su ma song ba la med //
analyzed: skyabs su ma song ba la med //
translated: they do not exist for those who have not gone for refuge.

original: dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pas //
analyzed: dge bsnyen nyid du khas blangs pas //
translated: One who has taken up the vows of a layperson

original: sdom pa bstan pa dge slong bzhin //
analyzed: sdom pa bstan pa dge slong bzhin //
translated: is taught to have the vows, just like a fully ordained monk.

original: gal te thams cad bsdams yin na //
analyzed: gal te thams cad bsdams yin na //
translated: If all are restrained,

original: sna gcig spyod sogs ji lta bu //🔽de srung ba la gsungs zhes grag /
analyzed: sna gcig spyod sogs ji lta bu // de srung ba la gsungs zhes grag /
translated: how is there one who practices one part, and so on?🔽It is renowned that one is taught to guard the small and so on,

original: chung ngu la sogs yid ji bzhin //
analyzed: chung ngu la sogs yid ji bzhin //
translated: according to one's mind.

original: gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro de //
analyzed: gang zhig gsum la skyabs 'gro de //
translated: One who goes for refuge to the three

original: sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dge 'dun byed pa'i chos //
translated: goes for refuge to the Buddha, the Sangha, and the Dharma that is the path.

original: mi slob pa dang gnyis ka dang // mya ngan 'das la skyabs su 'gro //
analyzed: mi slob pa dang gnyis ka dang // mya ngan 'das la skyabs su 'gro //
translated: One goes for refuge to the nonlearner, both, and to nirvana.

original: log g-yem shin tu smad phyir dang // sla phyir mi byed thob phyir ro //
analyzed: log g-yem shin tu smad phyir dang // sla phyir mi byed thob phyir ro //
translated: Sexual misconduct is extremely reprehensible, easy to avoid, and obtained by not doing.

original: sdom pa ji ltar khas blangs bzhin //
analyzed: sdom pa ji ltar khas blangs bzhin //
translated: One obtains vows in accordance with the promise,

original: 'thob kyi rgyud las ma yin no //
analyzed: 'thob kyi rgyud las ma yin no //
translated: not from the continuum.

original: bslab pa thams cad 'das gyur na //
analyzed: bslab pa thams cad 'das gyur na //
translated: If one transgresses all the trainings,

original: rdzun du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rdzun du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir //
translated: it would follow that one would lie.

original: bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba //
analyzed: bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba //
translated: One must guard against natural and proscribed offenses

original: myos 'gyur las gzhan bsrung phyir ro //
analyzed: myos 'gyur las gzhan bsrung phyir ro //
translated: other than those that cause madness.🔽One obtains all vows related to the desire realm

original: 'dod gtogs thams cad gnyis ka dang // da ltar dag las 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: 'dod gtogs thams cad gnyis ka dang // da ltar dag las 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: from both and from present objects.

original: bsam gtan zag med sdom pa ni //
analyzed: bsam gtan zag med sdom pa ni //
translated: The vows of absorption and uncontaminated vows

original: dngos dang dus ni thams cad las //
analyzed: dngos dang dus ni thams cad las //
translated: are obtained from the actual basis and all times.

original: sdom pa sems can thams cad las //
analyzed: sdom pa sems can thams cad las //
translated: Vows are obtained from all sentient beings.

original: yan lag rgyu la dbye ba yod //
analyzed: yan lag rgyu la dbye ba yod //
translated: There is a classification of branches and causes.🔽Nonvows are not obtained from all causes

original: sdom pa min pa thams cad dang // yan lag kun las rgyus min no //🔽sdom pa min pa bya ba'am //
analyzed: sdom pa min pa thams cad dang // yan lag kun las rgyus min no // sdom pa min pa bya ba'am //
translated: and all branches.🔽Nonvows are obtained from action

original: khas len pa las 'thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: khas len pa las 'thob par 'gyur //
translated: or from accepting them.🔽The remaining nonindicative states are obtained

original: lhag ma'i rnam rig min zhing dang // len dang gus par byed pas 'thob //🔽bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang // mtshan gnyis dag ni byung ba dang // rtsa ba chad dam mtshan 'das las //
analyzed: lhag ma'i rnam rig min zhing dang // len dang gus par byed pas 'thob // bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang // mtshan gnyis dag ni byung ba dang // rtsa ba chad dam mtshan 'das las //
translated: from accepting them and from respectfully performing them.🔽The vinaya of individual liberation is relinquished🔽through offering back the training, death, changing gender,

original: so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba gtong //
analyzed: so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba gtong //
translated: cutting the root, or the passage of time.

original: kha cig ltung bar 'gyur las smra //🔽gzhan dag dam chos nub pa las //
analyzed: kha cig ltung bar 'gyur las smra // gzhan dag dam chos nub pa las //
translated: Some say that it is relinquished through downfalls.🔽Others say that it is relinquished when the true Dharma

original: kha che rnams ni byung ba la //
analyzed: kha che rnams ni byung ba la //
translated: perishes.🔽Kashmiri masters say that it is relinquished

original: bu lon nor bzhin gnyis su 'dod //
analyzed: bu lon nor bzhin gnyis su 'dod //
translated: like a debt, in two ways.

original: bsam gtan gtogs pa'i dge ba ni //
analyzed: bsam gtan gtogs pa'i dge ba ni //
translated: Virtuous vows belonging to the absorptions

original: sa 'phos nyams pa dag gis gtong //
analyzed: sa 'phos nyams pa dag gis gtong //
translated: are relinquished through changing level or degeneration.

original: de bzhin gzugs med gtogs 'phags pa //
analyzed: de bzhin gzugs med gtogs 'phags pa //
translated: So too, those belonging to the formless realm.

original: 'bras bu thob @12b sbyangs nyams pa las //
analyzed: 'bras bu thob @12b sbyangs nyams pa las //
translated: through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level🔽and through the arising of the antidote.🔽Nonvirtuous and neutral minds

original: sdom min sdom pa thob pa dang // shi dang mtshan gnyis byung ba las //
analyzed: sdom min sdom pa thob pa dang // shi dang mtshan gnyis byung ba las //
translated: are relinquished through obtaining a result,🔽through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level

original: bar ma shugs blangs bya ba dang // don tshe rtsa ba chad pa las //
analyzed: bar ma shugs blangs bya ba dang // don tshe rtsa ba chad pa las //
translated: and through the arising of the antidote.

original: 'dod gtogs dge ba gzugs min ni //
analyzed: 'dod gtogs dge ba gzugs min ni //
translated: Nonvirtuous and neutral minds🔽are relinquished through obtaining a result,🔽through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level

original: rtsa chad gong du skyes pa las //
analyzed: rtsa chad gong du skyes pa las //
translated: and through the arising of the antidote.

original: nyon mongs pa can gzugs min ni//
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gzugs min ni//
translated: Nonvirtuous and neutral minds🔽are relinquished through obtaining a result,

original: gnyen po skyes pas rnam nyams 'gyur //
analyzed: gnyen po skyes pas rnam nyams 'gyur //
translated: through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level🔽and through the arising of the antidote.

original: za ma ma ning sgra mi snyan //
analyzed: za ma ma ning sgra mi snyan //
translated: Nonvirtuous and neutral minds🔽are relinquished through obtaining a result,

original: mtshan gnyis ma gtogs mi rnams la //
analyzed: mtshan gnyis ma gtogs mi rnams la //
translated: through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level

original: sdom min sdom pa'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: sdom min sdom pa'ang de bzhin no //
translated: and through the arising of the antidote.🔽Nonvirtuous and neutral minds

original: lha la'ang mi rnams la gsum mo //
analyzed: lha la'ang mi rnams la gsum mo //
translated: are relinquished through obtaining a result,🔽through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level

original: 'dod dang gzugs skyes lha rnams la //
analyzed: 'dod dang gzugs skyes lha rnams la //
translated: and through the arising of the antidote.🔽Nonvirtuous and neutral minds🔽are relinquished through obtaining a result,🔽through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level🔽and through the arising of the antidote.🔽Nonvirtuous and neutral minds

original: bsam gtan skyes yod zag med ni //
analyzed: bsam gtan skyes yod zag med ni //
translated: are relinquished through obtaining a result,

original: bsam gtan khyad par 'du shes med //
analyzed: bsam gtan khyad par 'du shes med //
translated: through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level

original: sems can ma gtogs gzugs med na'ang //
analyzed: sems can ma gtogs gzugs med na'ang //
translated: and through the arising of the antidote.🔽Nonvirtuous and neutral minds

original: las bde mi bde dang gzhan ni //
analyzed: las bde mi bde dang gzhan ni //
translated: are relinquished through obtaining a result,🔽through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level🔽and through the arising of the antidote.

original: dge dang mi dge dang gzhan yin //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge dang gzhan yin //
translated: Nonvirtuous and neutral minds🔽are relinquished through obtaining a result,

original: bsod nams bsod nams min mi g-yo //
analyzed: bsod nams bsod nams min mi g-yo //
translated: through upgrading one's intellectual faculty,🔽through relocating to a higher level🔽and through the arising of the antidote.

original: bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum //
analyzed: bde ba myong 'gyur la sogs gsum //
translated: The three karma of experiencing pleasure and so on

original: bsod nams 'dod khams dge ba'i las //
analyzed: bsod nams 'dod khams dge ba'i las //
translated: are virtuous karma of the desire realm.

original: mi g-yo gong ma las skyes pa'i //🔽gang phyir sa ni de dag tu //
analyzed: mi g-yo gong ma las skyes pa'i // gang phyir sa ni de dag tu //
translated: Non-wavering karma arises from the higher realms.🔽Because karma ripens in those realms,

original: las rnams smin phyir mi g-yo'i phyir //
analyzed: las rnams smin phyir mi g-yo'i phyir //

original: bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba //
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa'i bar dge ba //
translated: Up to the third absorption, karma is virtuous

original: bde ba myong 'gyur de yan chad //🔽sdug min bde min myong 'gyur ba //🔽sdug bsngal myong 'gyur 'di'i mi dge 'og na'ang bar ma yod do zhes //

original: kha cig zer te gang gi phyir //🔽bsam gtan khyad par rnam smin las //
analyzed: kha cig zer te gang gi phyir // bsam gtan khyad par rnam smin las //

original: snga phyi med gsum smin 'dod phyir //🔽ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs ldan dang // dmigs pa dang ni rnam smin dang // mngon sum du ni gyur pa las //
analyzed: snga phyi med gsum smin 'dod phyir // ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs ldan dang // dmigs pa dang ni rnam smin dang // mngon sum du ni gyur pa las //

analyzed: myong 'gyur rnam pa lnga yin no // de yang nges dang ma nges dang // mthong ba'i chos la sogs pa la //
translated: Karma to be experienced is fivefold:🔽by nature, concomitance,🔽object, ripening, and manifestation.🔽It is also threefold: definite, indefinite,

original: myong 'gyur phyir na nges rnam gsum //
analyzed: myong 'gyur phyir na nges rnam gsum //
translated: and to be experienced in this life and so on.🔽Karma to be experienced is threefold: definite, indefinite,🔽and to be experienced in this life and so on.

original: kha cig las rnam lnga zhes zer //
analyzed: kha cig las rnam lnga zhes zer //

original: gzhan dag mu ni bzhi zhes zer //
analyzed: gzhan dag mu ni bzhi zhes zer //

original: gsum gyis rigs ni 'phen par byed //
analyzed: gsum gyis rigs ni 'phen par byed //

original: thams cad na ni 'phen pa bzhi //
analyzed: thams cad na ni 'phen pa bzhi //

original: dmyal ba na ni dge ba'i gsum //
analyzed: dmyal ba na ni dge ba'i gsum //

original: gang las 'dod chags bral brtan pa'i //
analyzed: gang las 'dod chags bral brtan pa'i //

analyzed: byis pa der skyes myong mi byed // 'phags pa gzhan du'ang myong mi byed // 'dod rtse'i mi brtan pa yang min //
translated: Aryas do not experience there.🔽Those of the summit of existence are unstable.

original: srid pa bar ma 'dod khams su //
analyzed: srid pa bar ma 'dod khams su //
translated: In the desire realm, intermediate existence

analyzed: 'phen pa rnam pa nyi shu gnyis // de ni mthong chos @13a * //

original: 'bras bu yin //
analyzed: 'bras bu yin //

original: de ni rigs gcig kho na yin //
analyzed: de ni rigs gcig kho na yin //

analyzed: nyon mongs rab dang drag po dang // yon tan zhing dang rgyun chags su //

analyzed: byas pa gang zhig yin pa dang // pha ma gsod gang de nges so //

analyzed: mthong chos 'bras bu can gyi las // zhing dang bsam pa'i khyad par las //

analyzed: sa de'i 'dod chags gtan bral phyir //

analyzed: mthong dang dgra bcom 'bras langs pa // de la phan gnod byas pa yi //

original: dkar nag la sogs bye brag gis //
analyzed: dkar nag la sogs bye brag gis //
translated: The action of the perfected being is like the action of the person in the state of absorption, etc.

original: las ni rnam pa bzhi yin no //🔽mi dge gzugs dang 'dod gtogs pa'i //🔽dge ba nyid ni rim bzhin du //🔽gnag dang dkar dang gnyis ka'i las //
analyzed: las ni rnam pa bzhi yin no //🔽mi dge gzugs dang 'dod gtogs pa'i //🔽dge ba nyid ni rim bzhin du //🔽gnag dang dkar dang gnyis ka'i las //
translated: The action of the perfected being is like the action

analyzed: de zad byed pa zag med yin // chos bzod 'dod chags bral ba yi //
translated: That which exhausts it is uncontaminated.🔽The uninterrupted path of freedom from attachment

original: bar chad med lam brgyad kyi gang //
analyzed: bar chad med lam brgyad kyi gang //
translated: to the receptivity to the cognition of phenomena

original: sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis de //
analyzed: sems pa rnam pa bcu gnyis de //
translated: is the twelfth volition.

original: nag po zad par byed pa'i las //
analyzed: nag po zad par byed pa'i las //
translated: That which exhausts black karma

original: dgu pa'i sems pa gang yin pa //
analyzed: dgu pa'i sems pa gang yin pa //

analyzed: de ni dkar nag zad byed yin // dkar po bsam gtan chags bral ba'i //
translated: is the last volition.🔽The last volition that arises on the uninterrupted path

original: bar chad med lam skyes tha mas //
analyzed: bar chad med lam skyes tha mas //

analyzed: gzhan ni dmyal ba myong 'gyur dang // 'dod gzhan myong 'gyur gnyis su rig / gzhan ni mthong bas spang bya gnag //

original: 'dod pa las skyes gzhan dkar gnag //
analyzed: 'dod pa las skyes gzhan dkar gnag //
translated: Karma arisen in the desire realm is black and white.

original: mi slob lus ngag las yid nyid //
analyzed: mi slob lus ngag las yid nyid //
translated: The body and speech karma of a nonlearner

original: thub pa'i gsum ste go rims bzhin //
analyzed: thub pa'i gsum ste go rims bzhin //

original: legs spyad gsum po thams cad ni //
analyzed: legs spyad gsum po thams cad ni //

original: gtsang byed rnam pa gsum yin no //
analyzed: gtsang byed rnam pa gsum yin no //
translated: are the three kinds of purification.

original: lus kyi la sogs mi dge ba //
analyzed: lus kyi la sogs mi dge ba //

original: nyes par spyad pa gsum du 'dod //
analyzed: nyes par spyad pa gsum du 'dod //

original: brnab sems la sogs las min yang //
analyzed: brnab sems la sogs las min yang //

original: yid kyi nyes spyad rnam gsum mo //
analyzed: yid kyi nyes spyad rnam gsum mo //

original: bzlog pa legs par spyad pa yin //
analyzed: bzlog pa legs par spyad pa yin //
translated: The opposite of these are the three types of good conduct.

original: de las che long @13b bsdus nas ni //
analyzed: de las che long @13b bsdus nas ni //
translated: From among these, the most important🔽are the ten paths of action,

original: dge dang mi dge ci rigs par //🔽las kyi lam ni bcur gsungs so //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge ci rigs par // las kyi lam ni bcur gsungs so //
translated: which are virtuous or nonvirtuous.

original: mi dge drug ni rnam rig min //
analyzed: mi dge drug ni rnam rig min //
translated: Six nonvirtuous actions are nonindicative.

original: gcig rnam gnyis so de dag kyang //
analyzed: gcig rnam gnyis so de dag kyang //
translated: One is of two types.🔽If one performs the virtuous actions,

original: byed na dge ba bdun rnam gyis //
analyzed: byed na dge ba bdun rnam gyis //

original: ting 'dzin las skyes rnam rig min //
analyzed: ting 'dzin las skyes rnam rig min //

original: nyer bsdogs rnams ni rnam rig byed //
analyzed: nyer bsdogs rnams ni rnam rig byed //
translated: The access concentrations are indicative.🔽The nonindicative is either arisen from concentration

original: rnam rig byed min 'gyur ba'am //
analyzed: rnam rig byed min 'gyur ba'am //

original: ma yin bzlog pa mjug yin no //
analyzed: ma yin bzlog pa mjug yin no //
translated: The opposite is the conclusion.

original: sbyor ba rtsa ba gsum las skyes //
analyzed: sbyor ba rtsa ba gsum las skyes //

original: de yi mjug thogs las byung phyir //
analyzed: de yi mjug thogs las byung phyir //

original: brnab sems sogs rtsa gsum las skyes //
analyzed: brnab sems sogs rtsa gsum las skyes //
translated: covetousness and so on arise from the three roots.

original: dge ba sbyor dang mjug bcas rnams //
analyzed: dge ba sbyor dang mjug bcas rnams //

original: chags sdang gti mug med las skyes //
analyzed: chags sdang gti mug med las skyes //
translated: arise from nonattachment, nonaversion and nonignorance.

original: gsod dang gnod sems tshig rtsub po //
analyzed: gsod dang gnod sems tshig rtsub po //

original: zhe sdang gis ni mthar phyin byed //
analyzed: zhe sdang gis ni mthar phyin byed //
translated: are completed by aversion.

original: log g-yem brnab sems ma byin len //
analyzed: log g-yem brnab sems ma byin len //
translated: Sexual misconduct, covetousness and taking that not given🔽arise from attachment.

original: chags pa yis ni rdzogs par byed //
analyzed: chags pa yis ni rdzogs par byed //

original: log par lta ba gti mug gis //
analyzed: log par lta ba gti mug gis //
translated: Wrong view is completed through delusion.

original: lhag ma gsum gyis rdzogs par 'dod //
analyzed: lhag ma gsum gyis rdzogs par 'dod //
translated: The other three are completed through the three roots.🔽The basis is sentient beings, enjoyments,

original: gzhi ni sems can longs spyod dang // ming dang gzugs ni ming yin no //
analyzed: gzhi ni sems can longs spyod dang // ming dang gzugs ni ming yin no //

original: snga dang mnyam du shi ba la //
analyzed: snga dang mnyam du shi ba la //
translated: When one dies before or at the same time,

original: dngos med lus gzhan skyes phyer ro //
analyzed: dngos med lus gzhan skyes phyer ro //
translated: One is not without a body, because another is born.

original: dmag la sogs par don gcig phyir //
analyzed: dmag la sogs par don gcig phyir //
translated: Because one has the same goal in an army and so on,

original: thams cad byed pa po bzhin ldan //
analyzed: thams cad byed pa po bzhin ldan //

original: srog gcod pa ni bsams bzhin du //🔽ma nor bar ni gzhan gsad pa'o //
analyzed: srog gcod pa ni bsams bzhin du // ma nor bar ni gzhan gsad pa'o //
translated: Killing is intentionally🔽Killing another without error.

original: ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor //
analyzed: ma byin len pa gzhan gyi nor //

original: mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed //🔽bgrod min 'gro ba 'dod pa yis //
analyzed: mthu dang 'jab bus bdag gir byed // bgrod min 'gro ba 'dod pa yis //

original: log par g-yem pa rnam pa bzhi //🔽rdzun tshig 'du shes gzhan sgyur ba'i //
analyzed: log par g-yem pa rnam pa bzhi // rdzun tshig 'du shes gzhan sgyur ba'i //
translated: Sexual misconduct is the four types of intercourse🔽With those who are not one’s partner, who are protected,🔽Or with one’s own partner through a wrong path.🔽Lying is

original: tshig don mngon par go ba'o //
analyzed: tshig don mngon par go ba'o //
translated: Speech that is understood by another with a different recognition.🔽That which is experienced by the three,

original: mig rna yid kyi rnam shes dang // gsum gyis nyams su myong gang de //
analyzed: mig rna yid kyi rnam shes dang // gsum gyis nyams su myong gang de //

original: mthong thos rnam par shes pa dang // rtogs pa yin te rim bzhin bshad //
analyzed: mthong thos rnam par shes pa dang // rtogs pa yin te rim bzhin bshad //
translated: Seeing, hearing, and the rest are the five sense consciousnesses.🔽Malicious speech is speech

original: phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir //🔽nyon mongs can gyi sems kyi tshig //
analyzed: phra ma pha rol dbye ba'i phyir // nyon mongs can gyi sems kyi tshig //
translated: that causes division among sentient beings.

original: tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa //
analyzed: tshig rtsub po ni mi snyan pa //
translated: Harsh speech is unpleasant speech.

original: nyon mongs can kun kyal pa nyid //
analyzed: nyon mongs can kun kyal pa nyid //

original: gzhan ni de las gzhan nyon mongs //
analyzed: gzhan ni de las gzhan nyon mongs //

original: kha gsag glu dang zlos gar bzhin //🔽bstan bcos ngan bzhin brnab sems ni //
analyzed: kha gsag glu dang zlos gar bzhin // bstan bcos ngan bzhin brnab sems ni //
translated: Flattery is like singing and dancing.🔽Covetousness is the desire

original: log pas gzhan gyi nor la chags //
analyzed: log pas gzhan gyi nor la chags //
translated: for others' wealth through wrong means.

original: gnod sems sems can la sdang ba //
analyzed: gnod sems sems can la sdang ba //
translated: Malice is the hatred of sentient beings.🔽Wrong view is the view that virtue and

original: dge dang mi dge med lta ba //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge med lta ba //
translated: evil do not exist.

original: log par lta ba yin 'di la //
analyzed: log par lta ba yin 'di la //
translated: This is wrong view.

original: gsum lam bdun ni las kyang yin //
analyzed: gsum lam bdun ni las kyang yin //
translated: Three and seven are also karma.

original: @14a * // med par lta bas rtsa ba gcod //
analyzed: @14a * // med par lta bas rtsa ba gcod //

original: 'dod gtogs skyes nas thob pa rnams //
analyzed: 'dod gtogs skyes nas thob pa rnams //
translated: Those belonging to the desire realm that are obtained from birth🔽are severed by the view of annihilation,

original: rgyu dang 'bras la skur 'debs pas //🔽kun gyis rim gyis mi'i nang du //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras la skur 'debs pas // kun gyis rim gyis mi'i nang du //
translated: which denies cause and effect.🔽All are severed gradually by humans

original: skyes pa bud med kyis gcod do //
analyzed: skyes pa bud med kyis gcod do //
translated: in the human realm, both men and women.

original: lta spyad de ni mi ldan pa'o //
analyzed: lta spyad de ni mi ldan pa'o //

original: mtshams ni the tshom yod lta bas /
analyzed: mtshams ni the tshom yod lta bas /
translated: The limit is doubt, because the view is limited.

original: mtshams med byed pa'i 'di la min //
analyzed: mtshams med byed pa'i 'di la min //

analyzed: dge ba bcu yi bar dag dang // gcig dang brgyad dang lnga dang min //

analyzed: dmyal ba na ni kyal pa dang // tshig rtsub gnod sems rnam gnyis so //

original: brnab sems log lta ldan pas so //
analyzed: brnab sems log lta ldan pas so //

original: sgra mi snyan na gsum yod de //
analyzed: sgra mi snyan na gsum yod de //

analyzed: de na bdun pa dngos su yang //

original: 'dod pa gzhan na mi dge bcu //
analyzed: 'dod pa gzhan na mi dge bcu //

original: dge ba gsum ni thams cad na //
analyzed: dge ba gsum ni thams cad na //

original: rnyed dang mngon du gyur sgo nas //
analyzed: rnyed dang mngon du gyur sgo nas //

original: gzugs med 'du shes med sems can //
analyzed: gzugs med 'du shes med sems can //

original: rnyed pas bdun yod lhag byas na //
analyzed: rnyed pas bdun yod lhag byas na //
translated: seven exist through acquisition.

original: mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang //
analyzed: mngon du gyur pa'i sgo nas kyang //
translated: From the perspective of manifestation,

original: dmyal bcas sgra mi snyan ma gtogs //
analyzed: dmyal bcas sgra mi snyan ma gtogs //
translated: all exist except for the hells and Kuru.

original: thams cad bdag po rgyu mthun dang // rnam smin 'bras bu 'byin par 'dod //
analyzed: thams cad bdag po rgyu mthun dang // rnam smin 'bras bu 'byin par 'dod //
translated: It is asserted that all produce results of dominance, natural outflow, and karmic maturation.

original: sdug bsngal phyir dang bsad phyir dang // gzi byin med phyir 'bras rnam gsum //
analyzed: sdug bsngal phyir dang bsad phyir dang // gzi byin med phyir 'bras rnam gsum //
translated: pain, death, and the loss of splendor.🔽Those arisen from attachment are

analyzed: lus dang ngag las chags las skyes //
translated: from body and speech.🔽Wrong livelihood is taught separately

analyzed: log 'tsho sbyang dka'i phyir logs shig // bstan to gal te yo byad la // chags bslang mdo dang 'gal phyir min //

original: drir bcas spong ba'i lam dag gi //
analyzed: drir bcas spong ba'i lam dag gi //

original: las ni lnga yi 'bras bur bcas //
analyzed: las ni lnga yi 'bras bur bcas //

original: dri med bzhi yi zag bcas gzhan //
analyzed: dri med bzhi yi zag bcas gzhan //

original: dge dang mi dge gang yin pa'ang //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge gang yin pa'ang //

original: zag pa med pa lhag ma dang // lung bstan min gang gsum gyis so //
analyzed: zag pa med pa lhag ma dang // lung bstan min gang gsum gyis so //

original: dge ba'i dge la sogs pa ni //
analyzed: dge ba'i dge la sogs pa ni //

original: bzhi dang gnyis dang de bzhin gsum //
analyzed: bzhi dang gnyis dang de bzhin gsum //

original: mi dge'i dge sogs gnyis dang ni //
analyzed: mi dge'i dge sogs gnyis dang ni //

original: gsum dang bzhi ste rim pa bzhin //
analyzed: gsum dang bzhi ste rim pa bzhin //

original: lung bstan min gyi dge la sogs //
analyzed: lung bstan min gyi dge la sogs //

original: de dag gnyis dang gsum dang gsum //
analyzed: de dag gnyis dang gsum dang gsum //
translated: are two, three, and three.

original: 'das pa'i thams cad bzhi yin no //
analyzed: 'das pa'i thams cad bzhi yin no //

original: bar ma yi ni ma 'ongs pa'ang //
analyzed: bar ma yi ni ma 'ongs pa'ang //

original: bar ma gnyis so ma skyes pa'i //
analyzed: bar ma gnyis so ma skyes pa'i //

original: 'bras bu ma 'ongs gsum yin no //
analyzed: 'bras bu ma 'ongs gsum yin no //

original: rang gi sa pa bzhi yin no //
analyzed: rang gi sa pa bzhi yin no //

original: gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang gnyis //
analyzed: gzhan gyi sa pa gsum dang gnyis //

original: @14b slob pa'i slob la sogs pa gsum //
analyzed: @14b slob pa'i slob la sogs pa gsum //

analyzed: mi slob las kyi 'bras bu ni // slob pa yi ni chos la sogs //

original: gcig dang gsum dang gnyis yin no //
analyzed: gcig dang gsum dang gnyis yin no //
translated: are the single, three, and two🔽of the learner, etc.

original: de las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu ni //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i 'bras bu ni //
translated: The fruits of the other are

original: slob sogs gnyis dang gnyis dang lnga //
analyzed: slob sogs gnyis dang gnyis dang lnga //
translated: the two, two, and five of the learner, etc.🔽The three, four, and one

original: mthong bas spang bya'i de la sogs //
analyzed: mthong bas spang bya'i de la sogs //
translated: of the objects to be abandoned by the path of seeing, etc.

original: gsum dang bzhi dang gcig yin no //
analyzed: gsum dang bzhi dang gcig yin no //
translated: The two, four, and three

original: bsgom pas spang bar bya las kyi //
analyzed: bsgom pas spang bar bya las kyi //

original: de dag gnyis dang bzhi dang gsum //
analyzed: de dag gnyis dang bzhi dang gsum //
translated: The single, two, and four

original: spang bya min pa'i de dag gcig //🔽gnyis dang bzhi ste go rims bzhen //
analyzed: spang bya min pa'i de dag gcig // gnyis dang bzhi ste go rims bzhen //
translated: of the objects not to be abandoned.🔽The nonarising of the unarisen

original: rigs min bskyed pa nyon mongs can //
analyzed: rigs min bskyed pa nyon mongs can //
translated: is afflicted.

original: kha cig cho ga nyams pa'ang zhe'o //
analyzed: kha cig cho ga nyams pa'ang zhe'o //

original: gcig gis skye ba gcig 'phen to //
analyzed: gcig gis skye ba gcig 'phen to //

original: yongs rdzogs byed pa du ma yin /
analyzed: yongs rdzogs byed pa du ma yin /

original: sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dag //
analyzed: sems med snyoms par 'jug pa dag //

original: 'phen byed ma yin thob pa'ang min //
analyzed: 'phen byed ma yin thob pa'ang min //
translated: They are also not obtained.🔽The three obscurations are asserted to be the karmas of the heinous acts,🔽the great afflictions, the lower rebirths,

original: mtshams med pa yi las rnams dang // nyon mongs shas chen ngan 'gro dang // 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang // sgra mi snyan sgrib gsum du 'dod //
analyzed: mtshams med pa yi las rnams dang // nyon mongs shas chen ngan 'gro dang // 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang // sgra mi snyan sgrib gsum du 'dod //
translated: beings devoid of discernment, and Uttarakuru.

original: mtshams med gling gsum dag na yod //
analyzed: mtshams med gling gsum dag na yod //

original: za ma sogs la mi 'dod do //
analyzed: za ma sogs la mi 'dod do //

original: phan dang ngo tsha chung ba'i phyir //
analyzed: phan dang ngo tsha chung ba'i phyir //

original: lhag ma 'gro ba lnga dag na //
analyzed: lhag ma 'gro ba lnga dag na //
translated: The remaining five reincarnating beings🔽are the basis for the schism of the Saṅgha.

original: dge 'dun dbyen ni mi 'phrod pa'i //
analyzed: dge 'dun dbyen ni mi 'phrod pa'i //
translated: The schism of the Saṅgha is a nonvirtuous

original: rang bzhin ldan pa ma yin chos //
analyzed: rang bzhin ldan pa ma yin chos //

original: nyon mongs can min lung bstan min //
analyzed: nyon mongs can min lung bstan min //

original: de dag dge 'dun yang dag ldan //
analyzed: de dag dge 'dun yang dag ldan //

original: de yi kha na ma tho rdzun //
analyzed: de yi kha na ma tho rdzun //

original: de dang 'byed po yang dag ldan //
analyzed: de dang 'byed po yang dag ldan //

original: bskal par mnar med par smin 'gyur //
analyzed: bskal par mnar med par smin 'gyur //

original: lhag pas gnod pa lhag par 'gyur //
analyzed: lhag pas gnod pa lhag par 'gyur //

original: dge slong lta spyad tshul ldan pas //
analyzed: dge slong lta spyad tshul ldan pas //

original: 'byed do gzhan du'o byis pa rnams /
analyzed: 'byed do gzhan du'o byis pa rnams /

original: ston dang lam gzhan la bzod pa //
analyzed: ston dang lam gzhan la bzod pa //

analyzed: bye ba'o de ni mi gnas so // de ni 'khor lo'i dbyen du 'dod //

analyzed: 'dzam bu'i gling na'o dgu sogs kyi //

original: las kyi dbyen ni gling gsum na //
analyzed: las kyi dbyen ni gling gsum na //

original: de ni brgyad dag yan chad kyis //
analyzed: de ni brgyad dag yan chad kyis //
translated: The schism of the wheel does not occur

original: dang po mtha' skyon zung gcig gi //
analyzed: dang po mtha' skyon zung gcig gi //

original: snga rol thub pa nongs pa dang // mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang //
analyzed: snga rol thub pa nongs pa dang // mtshams ma bcad pa dag tu yang //

original: 'khor lo'o dbyen ni mi 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'khor lo'o dbyen ni mi 'byung ngo //

original: phan 'dogs pa dang yon tan zhing //
analyzed: phan 'dogs pa dang yon tan zhing //

original: spangs dang med par byas phyir ro //🔽mtshan ni gzhan du gyur kyang 'gyur //
analyzed: spangs dang med par byas phyir ro // mtshan ni gzhan du gyur kyang 'gyur //

original: gang gi zla mtshan las byung ma //
analyzed: gang gi zla mtshan las byung ma //
translated: The schism of the wheel does not occur

original: sangs rgyas brdeg par sems la @15a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas brdeg par sems la @15a * //

original: min // bsnun 'og sgra bcom pa la min //
analyzed: min // bsnun 'og sgra bcom pa la min //

original: mtshams med sbyor ba byas pa la //
analyzed: mtshams med sbyor ba byas pa la //

original: 'dod chags bral 'bras mi srid do //
analyzed: 'dod chags bral 'bras mi srid do //
translated: The schism of the wheel does not occur🔽before the Buddha’s passing,🔽because the schism is created by abandoning the Buddha and making him nonexistent.🔽The schism of the Saṅgha is created by lying

original: dge 'dun dbye phyir rdzun smra ba //
analyzed: dge 'dun dbye phyir rdzun smra ba //

original: kha na ma tho rab cher 'dod //
analyzed: kha na ma tho rab cher 'dod //

original: 'jig rten pa yi dge ba la //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa yi dge ba la //
translated: The virtuous worldly karma

original: srid rtse'i sems pa 'bras rab che//
analyzed: srid rtse'i sems pa 'bras rab che//

analyzed: lnga pa mchod rten 'jig pa yin //

analyzed: gang nas mtshan gyi las byed pa //

analyzed: bde 'gro rigs mthor skye dbang tshang //

analyzed: phor 'gyur tshe rabs dran mi ldog // de ni 'dzam gling pho gyur nyid //

analyzed: rnam gzigs mar me rin chen gtsug //
translated: to kill one’s mother,🔽to kill one’s father,🔽to kill an arhat,🔽to cause a schism in the saṅgha,🔽to kill an arhat,🔽to kill one

original: grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung //
analyzed: grangs med gsum gyi tha mar byung //

original: dang po sh'akya thub pa yin //
analyzed: dang po sh'akya thub pa yin //

original: kun la thams cad snying rje yis //
analyzed: kun la thams cad snying rje yis //
translated: To all, with compassion,

original: sbyin par byed pas sbyin pa rdzogs //
analyzed: sbyin par byed pas sbyin pa rdzogs //

original: chags bcas yan lag bcad kyang ni //
analyzed: chags bcas yan lag bcad kyang ni //

original: mi 'khrugs bzod dang tshul khrims kyi //
analyzed: mi 'khrugs bzod dang tshul khrims kyi //

original: skar rgyal bstod pas brtson 'grus kyi //
analyzed: skar rgyal bstod pas brtson 'grus kyi //

original: de ma thag la ting 'dzin blo'i //
analyzed: de ma thag la ting 'dzin blo'i //

original: gsum po bsod nams bya ba dang // de'i gzhi dper na las lam bzhin //
analyzed: gsum po bsod nams bya ba dang // de'i gzhi dper na las lam bzhin //
translated: The three perfections of generosity, morality, and patience are like the four paths of action of merit.

original: gang gis sbyin byed de sbyin pa //
analyzed: gang gis sbyin byed de sbyin pa //

analyzed: mchod dang phan gdags 'dod pa yis //

original: lus dang ngag las slong dang bcas //
analyzed: lus dang ngag las slong dang bcas //

analyzed: de 'bras longs spyod chen po can // bdag gzhan don phyir gnyis don phyir //

original: gnyis ka'i don du min phyir sbyin //
analyzed: gnyis ka'i don du min phyir sbyin //

original: de yi khyad par sbyin bdag dang // dngos dang zhing gi khyad pa las //
analyzed: de yi khyad par sbyin bdag dang // dngos dang zhing gi khyad pa las //

original: sbyin bdag khyad 'phags dad sogs kyis //
analyzed: sbyin bdag khyad 'phags dad sogs kyis //

original: gus la sogs pas sbyin par byed //
analyzed: gus la sogs pas sbyin par byed //
translated: One gives with respect and so on.🔽Therefore, one obtains vast honor,

original: de phyir bkur sti rgya chen dang // dus dang bar chad med par rnyed //
analyzed: de phyir bkur sti rgya chen dang // dus dang bar chad med par rnyed //
translated: and timely and uninterrupted wealth.

original: kha dog la sogs phun sum dngos //
analyzed: kha dog la sogs phun sum dngos //
translated: One obtains the best color and so on.🔽From that, one has a good body, fame,

original: de las gzugs bzang grags ldan dang // dga' @15b dang shin tu gzhon sha dang // dus su reg na bde lus 'gyur //
analyzed: de las gzugs bzang grags ldan dang // dga' @15b dang shin tu gzhon sha dang // dus su reg na bde lus 'gyur //

original: 'gro dang sdug bsngal phan 'dogs dang // yon tan rnams kyis zhing khyad 'phags //
analyzed: 'gro dang sdug bsngal phan 'dogs dang // yon tan rnams kyis zhing khyad 'phags //
translated: The field is superior due to going, suffering, benefit, and qualities.

original: mchog ni grol bas grol ba'am //
analyzed: mchog ni grol bas grol ba'am //

original: byang chub sems dpa' yis brgyad pa //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yis brgyad pa //

analyzed: 'phags pa min yang pha ma dang // nad pa dang ni chos smra dang // skye mtha'i byang chub sems dpa' la //

original: yon ni gzhal du med pa yin //
analyzed: yon ni gzhal du med pa yin //
translated: are immeasurable fields of merit.

original: mjug dang zhing dang gzhi dang ni //
analyzed: mjug dang zhing dang gzhi dang ni //
translated: The conclusion, the field, the basis,

original: sbyor dang sems pa bsam pa ste //🔽de dag chung dang che ba las //
analyzed: sbyor dang sems pa bsam pa ste // de dag chung dang che ba las //
translated: the application, the intention,🔽and the small and great

original: las kyang chung dang che ba nyid //
analyzed: las kyang chung dang che ba nyid //
translated: make the karma small and great.

original: bsams bzhin pa dang rdzogs pa dang // mi 'gyod gnyen po med pa dang // 'khor dang rnam par smin pa las //
analyzed: bsams bzhin pa dang rdzogs pa dang // mi 'gyod gnyen po med pa dang // 'khor dang rnam par smin pa las //

original: bsags pa'i las shes bya ba yin //🔽mchod rten la btang rgyus byung ba'i //
analyzed: bsags pa'i las shes bya ba yin // mchod rten la btang rgyus byung ba'i //

original: bsod nams len med byams sogs bzhin //
analyzed: bsod nams len med byams sogs bzhin //
translated: is like the four immeasurables.

original: rgyu las 'bras bu mi 'khrul phyir //
analyzed: rgyu las 'bras bu mi 'khrul phyir //
translated: Because the effect is not confused with its cause,

original: ngan pa'i zhing la'ang 'bras yid 'ong //
analyzed: ngan pa'i zhing la'ang 'bras yid 'ong //
translated: even a bad field has desirable fruit.

original: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi dge'i gzugs //
analyzed: 'chal pa'i tshul khrims mi dge'i gzugs //
translated: Immoral discipline is nonvirtuous form.

original: de spong tshul khrims rnam gnyis so //
analyzed: de spong tshul khrims rnam gnyis so //

original: sangs rgyas kyis ni bcad pa yang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyis ni bcad pa yang //
translated: Even what is prohibited by the Buddha

original: rnam dag yon tan bzhi ldan no //
analyzed: rnam dag yon tan bzhi ldan no //

original: 'chal khrims de'i rgyus 'phen ma byung //
analyzed: 'chal khrims de'i rgyus 'phen ma byung //

original: de gnyen po dang zhi la rten //
analyzed: de gnyen po dang zhi la rten //

original: mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge ba ni //
analyzed: mnyam par bzhag pa'i dge ba ni //

original: bsgom pa'o sems la sgo phyir ro //
analyzed: bsgom pa'o sems la sgo phyir ro //
translated: is meditation because it is for the sake of the mind.🔽Moral discipline is for the sake of the higher realms

analyzed: mtho ris don du tshul khrims dang // 'bral ba'i don du bsgom gtso'i phyir //

original: bskal par mtho ris dga' gnas phyir //
analyzed: bskal par mtho ris dga' gnas phyir //
translated: For one hundred eons, one abides in the joy of the higher realms.

original: bzhi yi tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin //🔽chos sbyin nyon mongs can min pas //
analyzed: bzhi yi tshangs pa'i bsod nams yin // chos sbyin nyon mongs can min pas //
translated: The merit of Brahmā is four times that.🔽The generosity of Dharma is the correct teaching of the sūtras and so on,

original: mdo sogs yang dag ji bzhin ston //
analyzed: mdo sogs yang dag ji bzhin ston //
translated: without afflicted motivation.🔽Merit, nirvāṇa, and the three virtues

original: bsod nams mya ngan 'das pa dang // nges 'byed cha mthun dge rnam gsum //
analyzed: bsod nams mya ngan 'das pa dang // nges 'byed cha mthun dge rnam gsum //

original: rigs pas rab tu bcug pa'i las //
analyzed: rigs pas rab tu bcug pa'i las //
