translated: because they arise in their mindstreams.

original: slob la 'dod de ma rig dang // bcas rgyud phyir na rig ma bshad //
analyzed: slob la 'dod de ma rig dang // bcas rgyud phyir na rig ma bshad //
translated: They are not called knowledge because they possess ignorance.

original: dang po gsum pa drug pa ni //
analyzed: dang po gsum pa drug pa ni //
translated: The first, third and sixth are the three miracles.🔽They are the supreme teachings because they are nonerroneous, beneficial and they connect one to the result of the attractive

original: cho 'phrul rnams yin bstan pa mchog / mi 'khrul @23b phyir dang phan pa dang // yid 'ong 'bras la sbyor byed phyir //
analyzed: cho 'phrul rnams yin bstan pa mchog / mi 'khrul @23b phyir dang phan pa dang // yid 'ong 'bras la sbyor byed phyir //
translated: The miracles are the supreme teaching, because they are non-deceptive, beneficial, and connect one with the attractive result.

original: rdzu 'phrul ting 'dzin de las ni //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul ting 'dzin de las ni //
translated: From concentration miracles

original: sprul dang 'gro ba ston pa la //
analyzed: sprul dang 'gro ba ston pa la //
translated: are emanations and the display of going.

original: yid mgyogs 'gro ba gzhan dag la //🔽phyin byed mos pa las byung yang //
analyzed: yid mgyogs 'gro ba gzhan dag la // phyin byed mos pa las byung yang //
translated: The mind is swift, but others go🔽through the power of aspiration.

original: 'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa ni //
analyzed: 'dod par gtogs pa'i sprul pa ni //
translated: Emanations belonging to the desire realm

original: phyi yi skye mched bzhi rnam gnyis //
analyzed: phyi yi skye mched bzhi rnam gnyis //
translated: are the four external bases.

original: gzugs gtogs gnyis sprul sems dag gis //
analyzed: gzugs gtogs gnyis sprul sems dag gis //
translated: Emanations belonging to the form realm are emanated by the minds of those two.

original: de dag kyang ni bcu bzhi'o //
analyzed: de dag kyang ni bcu bzhi'o //
translated: They are also the fourteen.

original: bsam gtan 'bras gnyis nas lnga'i bar //
analyzed: bsam gtan 'bras gnyis nas lnga'i bar //
translated: The two results of absorption are from the second to the fifth.

original: rim bzhin gong ma las skyes min //
analyzed: rim bzhin gong ma las skyes min //
translated: They are not born from the higher absorptions.

original: de rnyed bsam gtan bzhin de ni //
analyzed: de rnyed bsam gtan bzhin de ni //
translated: It is like the attainment of absorption.

original: dag dang rang las de las gnyis //
analyzed: dag dang rang las de las gnyis //
translated: It is pure and from its level and both from higher levels.

original: rang gi sa pas sprul par byed //
analyzed: rang gi sa pas sprul par byed //
translated: It emanates that which is of its level.

original: smrar 'jug pa ni 'og mas kyang //
analyzed: smrar 'jug pa ni 'og mas kyang //
translated: Even those of lower level can speak.

original: ston min sprul pa po dang bcas //
analyzed: ston min sprul pa po dang bcas //
translated: It is not taught that the emanator and the emanation🔽are of the same level.

original: byin gyis brlabs nas gzhan 'jug phyir //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas gzhan 'jug phyir //
translated: Because it is empowered and then enters another.

original: shi ba la yang byin brlabs yod //
analyzed: shi ba la yang byin brlabs yod //
translated: Empowerment exists for the dead.

original: mi brtan la med gzhan dag min //
analyzed: mi brtan la med gzhan dag min //
translated: It does not exist for the unstable and others.

original: dang po du mas gcig yin te //
analyzed: dang po du mas gcig yin te //
translated: First, many emanate one.

original: byang bar gyur nas bzlog pa'o //
analyzed: byang bar gyur nas bzlog pa'o //
translated: When perfected, it is the reverse.

original: bsgoms las skyes pa lung ma bstan //
analyzed: bsgoms las skyes pa lung ma bstan //
translated: That arisen from meditation is neutral.

original: skye ba las skyes rnam gsum mo //
analyzed: skye ba las skyes rnam gsum mo //
translated: That arisen from birth is of three types.

original: rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags sman dag dang // las las skyes dang rnam pa lnga //
analyzed: rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags sman dag dang // las las skyes dang rnam pa lnga //
translated: It is of five types: arisen from supernatural power, mantra, medicine, karma and meditation.

original: lha yi mig dang rna ba yin //
analyzed: lha yi mig dang rna ba yin //
translated: It is the divine eye and ear.

original: bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang ba //
analyzed: bsam gtan sa pa'i gzugs dang ba //
translated: It is the form and virtue of the level of absorption.

original: rtag tu rten bcas ma tshang med //
analyzed: rtag tu rten bcas ma tshang med //
translated: It is always supported and complete.

original: thag ring phra sogs spyod yul can //
analyzed: thag ring phra sogs spyod yul can //
translated: It has the range of distant, subtle and so on.

original: dgra bcom bse ru ston rnams kyis //
analyzed: dgra bcom bse ru ston rnams kyis //
translated: Arhats, rhinoceros and teacher buddhas

original: stong gnyis gsum dang grangs med mthong ;🔽/ gzhan yang skye bas thob des ni //
analyzed: stong gnyis gsum dang grangs med mthong ; / gzhan yang skye bas thob des ni //
translated: One sees two, three thousand, and countless.

original: srid pa bar ma mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: srid pa bar ma mi mthong ngo //
translated: Moreover, one born there does not see the intermediate existence.

original: sems shes de ni rnam gsum gang //
analyzed: sems shes de ni rnam gsum gang //
translated: The knowledge of others' minds is of three types.

original: rtog dang rig sngags kyis byas pa'ang //
analyzed: rtog dang rig sngags kyis byas pa'ang //
translated: It is also produced by thought and by mantra.

original: dmyal ba pas ni dang po shes //
analyzed: dmyal ba pas ni dang po shes //
translated: One born in hell knows the first.

original: mi la skye bas thob pa med //🔽chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las /
analyzed: mi la skye bas thob pa med // chos mngon pa'i mdzod kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las /
translated: Humans do not have knowledge obtained from birth.

original: ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas bdun pa'o /🔽// / bsam gtan dag ni rnam gnyis bzhi //
analyzed: ye shes bstan pa zhes bya ba ste gnas bdun pa'o / // / bsam gtan dag ni rnam gnyis bzhi //
translated: This completes the seventh chapter of the Abhidharmakośa, called “The Exposition of Knowledge.”

original: der skye ba dag rab tu bshad //
analyzed: der skye ba dag rab tu bshad //
translated: The dhyānas are twofold, the four are explained as being born there.

original: snyoms 'jug dge ba rtse gcig pa //
analyzed: snyoms 'jug dge ba rtse gcig pa //
translated: Meditative attainment is virtuous, single-pointed concentration.

original: rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga //🔽dpyod dang dga' dang bde dang ldan //
analyzed: rjes 'brang bcas na phung po lnga // dpyod dang dga' dang bde dang ldan //
translated: If it possesses its following, it has five aggregates.

original: yan lag snga snga spangs pa yi //
analyzed: yan lag snga snga spangs pa yi //
translated: It possesses investigation, joy, pleasure, and it is endowed with the former branches.

original: de bzhin gzugs med phung po bzhi //
analyzed: de bzhin gzugs med phung po bzhi //
translated: The formless are similar, but each higher one abandons one branch.

original: 'og ma'i sa las dben las skyes //🔽nyer bsdogs gsum dang bcas par ni //
analyzed: 'og ma'i sa las dben las skyes // nyer bsdogs gsum dang bcas par ni //
translated: The formless are born from separation from lower levels.

original: gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'du shes bshig ces bya //
translated: It is said that the form aggregate is destroyed in the three access concentrations.

original: gzugs med pa na gzugs med do //
analyzed: gzugs med pa na gzugs med do //
translated: There is no form in the formless realm.🔽Form arises from mind.

original: gzugs ni sems las skye bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gzugs ni sems las skye bar 'gyur //
translated: The formless realm is fourfold:

original: rnam shes mtha' yas mkha' mtha' yas //
analyzed: rnam shes mtha' yas mkha' mtha' yas //
translated: Infinite consciousness, infinite space,

original: ci yang med ces bya de ltar //
analyzed: ci yang med ces bya de ltar //
translated: Nothing whatsoever, and neither existence nor nonexistence.

original: sbyor phyir dman @24a * //🔽phyir 'du shes med //
analyzed: sbyor phyir dman @24a * // phyir 'du shes med //
translated: They are called lower because they are inferior to the higher formless realm.🔽The fourth is called neither existence nor nonexistence because it is the summit of existence.

original: 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du shes med pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is called neither perception nor nonperception because it is inferior to the higher stage.

original: de ltar snyoms 'jug dngos gzhi'i rdzas //
analyzed: de ltar snyoms 'jug dngos gzhi'i rdzas //
translated: Thus the substance of the actual basis of meditative attainment

original: rnam pa brgyad bdun rnam pa gsum //
analyzed: rnam pa brgyad bdun rnam pa gsum //
translated: is eightfold, sevenfold, and threefold.🔽The eighth is twofold:

original: ro myang ldan dang dag pa dang // zag med brgyad pa rnam pa gnyis //
analyzed: ro myang ldan dang dag pa dang // zag med brgyad pa rnam pa gnyis //
translated: experiencing meditative attainment, pure, and uncontaminated.

original: ro myang mtshungs ldan sred bcas so //
analyzed: ro myang mtshungs ldan sred bcas so //
translated: Experiencing meditative attainment is contaminated.

original: 'jig rten pa yi dge ba ni //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa yi dge ba ni //
translated: Pure meditative attainment is mundane virtue.

original: dag pa de ni des myang bya //
analyzed: dag pa de ni des myang bya //
translated: It is experienced by that.

original: zag med 'jig rten 'das pa'o //
analyzed: zag med 'jig rten 'das pa'o //
translated: Uncontaminated meditative attainment is supramundane.

original: dang po la lnga rtog dpyod dang // dga' dang bde dang ting 'dzin rnams //
analyzed: dang po la lnga rtog dpyod dang // dga' dang bde dang ting 'dzin rnams //
translated: The first has five branches: investigation, analysis, joy, pleasure, and samadhi.

original: gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi //
analyzed: gnyis pa la ni yan lag bzhi //
translated: The second has four branches:

original: rab dang dang ni dga' la sogs //
analyzed: rab dang dang ni dga' la sogs //
translated: faith, joy, pleasure, and samadhi.
